name: Aisha
description: A daughter of a noble family from Orvel. As one of the most talented wizards in the Tower of Sage, she has been granted the title of 'Purple' in recognition of her magic capability. She was raised in the Tower of Sage since childhood at her parents' request, but she still retains her dignity as an aristocrat. As a child, she never realized why her parents sent her away on her own, but now she understands their reasons. Now, she is back home, and is always attended by her handmaiden, who is like another member of the family to her.

skill.name: Mystic Barrage
skill.description: Deals 357000 M.DMG to enemies within a small range. Upon a Crit Hit, cooldown is reduced by 1 sec

skill.name: Destruction Ray
skill.description: Every 0.5 sec, deals 104294 M.DMG to enemies in a straight line. After 5 sec, consumes 3% of mana every 0.5 sec while DMG is increased by 100%. Max duration is 10 sec

skill.name: Torrential Rainfall
skill.description: Deals 590490 M.DMG to random enemies for 3 sec, and reduces target's M.DEF by 5%. Can be stacked up to max 5 times

skill.name: Mystic Boost
skill.description: Upon a Crit Hit, deals extra 32814 M.DMG to the enemy

name: Annette
description: A genius technomagi from the Kingdom of Orvelia. She is highly optimistic, and failure never seems to bother her. She dreams of inventing a device that would allow anyone to handle magic one day. She has a magically engineered assistant whom she brought to life after years of research. Following the arrival of the Demons, she incorporated her research into developing weapons that would allow anyone to fight against the invaders.

skill.name: Blasting Ray
skill.description: Attacks enemies in a straight line, dealing 233135 M.DMG, and hit enemies take 25% increased M.DMG. If the skill is used when in Overcharge state, deals 233135 extra M.DMG, and hit enemies take 25% increased M.DMG

skill.name: Emergency Treatment
skill.description: Dispels negative effects of all allies and heals a total of 320550 HP for 10 sec while increasing CC Resistance by 250. While Overcharged, all allies' Crit Chance is increased by 250 and gains immunity to CC

skill.name: Process of Elimination
skill.description: Fires an exploding energy ball to a random target and nearby enemies in range, dealing a total of 621927 M.DMG. When in Overcharge state, deals a total of 146140 M.DMG and inflicts Stun for 5 sec upon explosion

skill.name: Charge
skill.description: Gains 1 stack of Charge every 0.5 sec, and gains 10 stacks of Charge per every orb of mana used. Upon the 100th Charge stacked, enters Overcharge state. When in Overcharge, ATK is increased by 35622 for 15 sec and each auto attack reduces skill cooldown by 10%. All effects cannot be dispelled, and Charge will not stack during Overcharge state

name: Arch
description: An Angel warrior who descended from the Heavens to punish the Demons and stop the spread of chaos on earth. His delegated tasks include scouting, reconnaissance, and execution of any Demons found on earth. He has a strong sense of responsibility and is quick and decisive against any injustice. He truly loves Mankind and all the life forms that inhabit the earth. This is why he strives to prevent the Demons from defiling this world.

skill.name: Celestial Arrow
skill.description: Deals 193398 M.DMG to 3 enemies and push them back, leaving a Judgment Sigil on them for 15 sec. Deals additional ??? M.DMG to Non-Hero enemies and causes them to take 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec

skill.name: Purifying Blaze
skill.description: Deals 382266 M.DMG to frontal enemies in a straight line. Deals additional 729969 M.DMG that ignores DEF to targets with Judgment Sigil, and reduces their Heal Rate by 50% for 10 sec

skill.name: Arbiter
skill.description: Deals 541319 M.DMG to the target and enemies in a nearby range. Enemies with Judgment Sigil take 50% increased M.DMG and become silenced for 5 sec. Afterward, grants immunity to M.DMG to all allies for 5 sec

skill.name: The Last Judgment
skill.description: Every 15 sec, deals 154780 M.DMG ignoring DEF to enemies inflicted by Judgement Sigil. Once during every battle, upon reaching near death HP, deals 330835 M.DMG to enemies inflicted by Judgement Sigils and stuns them for 3 sec, while casting a shield that blocks 563411 DMG to all allies for 5 sec. Gains immunity to CC while the shield is in effect. When the shield effect takes place, consumes all mana, and all skill cooldown is increased by 50%

name: Artemia
description: Penteonia is an impenetrable kingdom. Even the Demon Army could not breach its defense 100 years ago. Ruling over this iron kingdom is Artemia, the Empress of Light. Ever since childhood, she has lived under the weight of responsibility of the throne she would eventually inherit. When she finally realized that the victory of her kingdom was only made possible by the sacrifices of her people, she swore to never hide from her duties. She would face the pressure of royal responsibility with courage. Penteonia has historically been a selfish kingdom, only interested in its own safety. Now, with Artemia as its ruler, everything is about to change.

skill.name: Pillar of Light
skill.description: Places a Pillar of Light on target enemy, dealing a total of 366050 M.DMG for 3 sec and reducing enemy ATK by 20% for 10 sec

skill.name: Critical Intensity
skill.description: Deals 359697 M.DMG to frontal enemies in a straight line. This attack's Crit DMG is increased by 100%

skill.name: Light's Judgment
skill.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times, dealing a total of 545880 M.DMG and stunning them for 5 sec. Per each killed enemy with this skill, cooldown is reduced by 30%

skill.name: Blessing of Light
skill.description: Each attack has a 50% chance of dealing 44816 M.DMG to target and nearby enemies, while Artemia gains 1 stack of Blessing of Light. Blessing of Light can be stacked up to 10 times max. Per every stack, ATK is increased by 5222 , DMG dealt to enemies other than heroes is increased by 7% and DMG received from enemies other than heroes is reduced by 3%

name: Aselica
description: A powerful angel who defends the haven of angels. Even among the Angels who wield the power of light, she has a special connection to the sun, whose divine light she uses to fight against darkness. She is tasked with the protection of the souls of other angels awaiting resurrection. When the Holy Sword reappeared in the world, she heeded the divine call to join the new protector of the world. She will see to it that no chosen warrior would ever succumb to the darkness again.

skill.name: Sword of the Sun
skill.description: Deals 138175 M.DMG to enemy and surrounding enemies within range, and inflicts Stun for 3 sec

skill.name: Blessing of the Sun
skill.description: Imbues the Blessing of the Sun to the ally with the highest ATK, reducing cooldown of all skills by 20% and increasing ATK by 38948 for 15 sec

skill.name: Judgment of the Sun
skill.description: Takes position, focuses to heal HP of nearby allies, excluding self, 8 times for a total of 24357, and increases their P.DEF by 52477 for 5 sec. Deals a total of 277151 M.DMG on enemies within range over 8 times, and decreases their M.DEF by 28970 for 5 sec. After the end of the casting, heals HP of allies within range, excluding self, by 153676, and deals 119552 M.DMG on enemies, and knocks them down for 3 sec

skill.name: Curse of the Sun
skill.description: Upon attack, inflicts Curse of the Sun on the target for 10 sec. Enemies with 10 stacks of Curses of the Sun will consume the stack to receive 111223 M.DMG, and become inflicted with Blind for 2 sec, having their ATK reduced by 20% for 10 sec

name: Baudouin
description: As the most unlikely priest in the Church of Lua, Baudouin is, in a word, a maverick. Since childhood, he has always been a black sheep in the Church of Lua that emphasizes piety. He entered the church with the help of the High Priest Berman, but the religious life was painfully ill-suited for him. One day, however, he suddenly decided to quit his deviant ways, and started following the path of the high priesthood.

skill.name: Holy Nova
skill.description: Targets the ally with the lowest HP and allies nearby to heal 194058 HP. Deals 64342 M.DMG to enemies near the target, and reduces enemy ATK Spd by 25% for 10 sec.

skill.name: Spear of Light
skill.description: Deals 185571 M.DMG, inflicts knockback, and shackles the target enemy for 6 sec. Enemies inflicted by shackle take 25% increased M.DMG while the effect lasts.

skill.name: Holy Sanctuary
skill.description: Grants Invincibility to all allies for 7 sec and heals 298431 HP for the duration of skill.

skill.name: Training of God
skill.description: Each attack has a 20% chance of dealing 141067 M.DMG to target and inflicting stun for 1.5 sec.

name: Bernheim
description: Born in a noble family in Penteonia, Bernheim von Lachelima was gifted with outstanding martial skills. He had the strength of a giant and excellent judgment, so it was undeniable that he would make a great knight. However, he had a fatal flaw that kept him from being successful in Penteonia: He could not use the power of light at all. No matter how hard he tried, how strong his faith and will were, the power of light did not answer to his calling. Although all he ever wanted was to serve his nation and the Queen, the fact that his incapability was keeping him from being more than a low-level knight frustrated him. Bernheim did not give up and trained hard to handle the power of light, but his constant lack of progress slowly started to weaken his mind. One day, he visited the Central Church to study the power of light and its mechanism. It was when he was quietly reading a book that he heard a sound. It was an angelic voice calling for him. The long-accumulated frustration of Bernheim led him to where the voice was coming from, a room sealed with multiple magic barriers in the basement of the church. As he moved closer to it, the barriers vanished as if they were never there. What he saw inside the room was a sword in the shape of an angel, exuding blinding light. 'You are the chosen one', said the sword, drawing him near with holy light. Thinking that his relentless effort had finally paid off, he slowly grasped the sword. Then, his mind was drawn into the deepest darkness. The darkness that captured him—it was the endless shadowy void of futility. A vessel that could never be filled; a whole other universe. In the vast darkness, Bernheim felt his mind deteriorating and his existence fading away. His mind and body was slowly being encroached by a dark, ominous power. However, Bernheim was also one of the Penteonian Knights, a Knight of Light who swore not to be defeated by darkness. He rose from the shrouding darkness, regaining consciousness with his indomitable spirit. When he came to his senses, lying on the floor, there was a giant black sword in his hand. The demonic sword with the appearance of a demon was laughing and mocking the knight who broke away from the path of light. Eventually, Bernheim was banished from Penteonia, and he started to live a new life as a mercenary in Vespia Empire with that malicious, foul-mouthed demonic sword in his hand...

skill.name: Circle of Futility
skill.description: Attacks the target and nearby enemies within range, dealing 207231 M.DMG and placing the Circle of Futility. Circle of Futility deals 367856 M.DMG, reduces ATK Spd by 300 , and prevents enemies from receiving positive effects over 4 sec. A 4 sec Cooldown will be applied at the beginning of the first battle.

skill.name: Battle Initiation
skill.description: Attacks enemies within frontal range, dealing 249599 M.DMG and knocking them back. Then, increases own All DMG Reduction by 200 and DEF by 26118, and gains immunity to CC for 15 sec. A 8 sec Cooldown will be applied at the beginning of the first battle.

skill.name: Destroyer
skill.description: Deals 429520 M.DMG over 10 attacks to nearby enemies in a circular range around self. Then, attacks enemies in a wide surrounding area, dealing 376852 M.DMG and stunning them for 5 sec. If the target is not a Hero, each attack will deal additional 42074 M.DMG. A 10 sec Cooldown will be applied at the beginning of the first battle.

skill.name: Breakdown
skill.description: Bernheim cannot recover Mana, and all his Skills do not consume any Mana. Normal and Skill attacks inflict Breakdown to enemies for 10 sec, reducing their Heal Rate by 1%, and increasing own ATK by 3085 and Heal Rate by 0.5%. All effects stack up to 50 times.

name: Cain
description: Ancient Sekireinel was a kingdom blessed with eternal prosperity under the rule of Cain, the greatest king that has ever ruled Sekireinel. Descendants of the desert addess Cain as the God King, as it was their way of expressing their respect to the flawless, god-like king. The people of the desert praised and followed Cain's overwhelming charisma, and Cain in return, gifted them with the fairest rule, and showed endless generosity and benevolence to his people. In Contrast, against those who would threaten his kingdom, Cain did not show any mercy. He ruthlessly tracked down and killed all those who threatened the peace of his kingdom, causing fear within the nations outside. However, deep inside the majestic, ruthless God King who asserted his reign over the kingdom, there lied a deep loneliness. When alone, the God King would contemplate endlessly. It was Laias who held Cain's hands when he was most vulnerable, and Cain fell in love with Laias who sang for him. Cain has since strongly expressed his love to Laias, eager to help Laias fulfill anything she wants.

skill.name: Tremble!
skill.description: Cain heals the ally with the lowest HP by 237423 and grants the ally with [The God King’s Blessing], which reduces All DMG the ally receives 35% and grants immunity to CC for 3.5 sec. After 3.5 seconds, Cain dispels negative effects from the target and the allies nearby. Afterwards, heals their HP by 237423. [The God King’s Blessing] is irremovable.

skill.name: Kneel.
skill.description: Cain deals 212620 P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK and casts [Sealing Technique of the Tyrant] that reduces the target's ATK Spd 350 and prevents the target from receiving any positive effects for 5 sec. After 5 sec, Cain deals 176824 P.DMG to the target and the enemies nearby, inflicting stun for 3 sec. [Sealing Technique of the Tyrant] is irremovable.

skill.name: Behold My Might.
skill.description: Cain turns into a [Tyrant] and constantly attacks the target, dealing 82084 P.DMG with each hit. While Cain is in [Tyrant] form, [Tremble!] and [Gaze Upon My Almighty Power!] change to [Kneel.] and [Now Die.]. Upon using the Skill again, he returns to [God King] form. [The God King’s Mercy] - While Cain is in God King form, reduces DMG all allies take 10%. [Dignity of the Tyrant] – While Cain is in Tyrant form, increases DMG all enemies take 10%.

skill.name: Gaze Upon My Almighty Power!
skill.description: Increases All DEF of allies nearby self by 5222 for 10 sec 10 times. DEF Boost effect stacks up to 10 time(s), and if this Skill is cast on an ally with 10 stacks, increases the target’s ATK 150088 and grants immunity to CC for 10 sec.

skill.name: Now Die
skill.description: Places a [Gate of Hell] in frontal area of self for 3 sec, dealing a total of 158780 P.DMG to enemies in range over 10 attack(s) and pulling them to the center. Afterwards, explodes the [Gate of hell], dealing 152815 P.DMG and stunning the enemies for 3 sec.

skill.name: I Am the King of the Desert.
skill.description: At the beginning of each battle, gains an irremoveable stack of [King of the Desert]. Each Stack of of [King of the Desert] increases the effect of [The God King's Mercy] and [Dignity of the Tyrant] by 5%. Additionally, recovers 100 Mana every second, and increases ATK by 13055. If [King of the Desert] is stacked 3 time(s) or more, self deals 50% increased DMG to Bosses. [King of the Desert] can be stacked up to 5 times.

name: Cassandra
description: She's the owner of 'Gold Bar,' the biggest and the most luxurious tavern in Vespia. Beneath its flashy exterior, the tavern actually serves as a secret meeting place for the social elites, where invaluable secret information is constantly exchanged. Her natural charm and conversation skills can easily break down personal barriers and win the trust of others. Her true identity is a dealer of secret information and weapons.

skill.name: Softly~
skill.description: Heals all allies by 231308 HP and deals 161713 M.DMG to all enemies. Hit enemies are inflicted by Silence for 2 sec.

skill.name: Fiercely!
skill.description: For 15 sec, all allies' ATK is increased by 11874 and Crit Chance is increased by 700.

skill.name: Tempting Wave
skill.description: Deals 322459 M.DMG to an enemy with the highest ATK. If this skill is used in Arena, inflicts Charm on the target for 7 sec. If this skill is used outside the Arena, enemy takes 25% increased M.DMG. Charmed enemies cannot use any skills, and deals auto attack to own allies.

skill.name: Gentle Touch
skill.description: At the start of each battle, reduces mana cost by 2 orbs for a single skill, and all allies' DEF is increased by 20181 for 5 sec.

name: Cecilia
description: A girl that dreams of a world without injustice. Cecilia, also known as the Crimson Wind of Justice, defeats enemies with her windily kicks, flying her red ribbon in the air. Her grandfather is Ricardo, the captain of Orvelia Holy Knights. She grew up watching her grandfather render justice with his heart of steel, and now dreams of realizing justice and eradicating the evil in the Empire as a member of the Resistance. Ricardo is worried for his little granddaughter since her pursuit of justice might lead her to danger. However, her shouts and kicks are always dynamic and heroic, and such worries don't bother her at all.

skill.name: Outta the way!
skill.description: Marks the farthest enemy as the [Villain], reducing its ATK Spd by 200 for 15 sec. Then, moves to the target to deal 130933 P.DMG. After using this Skill, [Crushing Kick!] becomes available.

skill.name: Crushing Kick!
skill.description: Attacks the target, dealing 155307 P.DMG and knocking it away for 4 sec. Enemies marked as [Villain] are prioritized. After using this Skill, [Tempest Kick!] becomes available.

skill.name: Tempest Kick!
skill.description: Moves to the farthest enemy, dealing 185279 P.DMG and stunning it for 4 sec. Enemies marked as [Villain] are prioritized.

skill.name: Infinite Potential
skill.description: Deals 177450 P.DMG to nearby enemies in a circular range of self, knocking them down for 3 sec. Afterward, Cecilia gains [Infinite Potential], which increases own ATK Spd by 300 for 15 sec. While under [Infinite Potential], Normal and Skill attacks deal 29568 P.DMG to Heroes and 88713 P.DMG to Non-Hero enemies. This effect is irremovable.

skill.name: WA-TAAAAAH!!!
skill.description: Deals 495594 P.DMG over 6 attacks to nearby enemies in a circular range of self. Afterward, deals 246321 P.DMG to the target and its nearby enemies, knocking them down for 4 sec. While under [Infinite Potential], [Special Move. Meteor Kick!!!] becomes available for 10 sec.

skill.name: Special Move. Meteor Kick!!!
skill.description: Launches a full force attack that deals 762136 P.DMG to the target and enemies nearby, stunning them for 5 sec. This Skill will always be a Critical Hit.

skill.name: Inborn Talent
skill.description: Increases own DEF by 4981 and Crit Chance by 200. Cecilia's Normal and Skill attacks will not miss.

name: Chase
description: A man who has lost his memory. Test subject Type. 0 that was born as a part of the human enhancement experiment of the empire. As the first type of the Project Evil Knights that were only made to kill, Chase was brought through a secretive contract with the empire to assassinate the sole successor to its throne, Scarlet. However, he went berserk for unknown reasons during a fight against Clause and Demia who were guarding Scarlet, and he abandoned his mission and left. He failed to kill Scarlet and disappeared, so the nobles who had commissioned the assassination found themselves in trouble. In the end, they hired another assassination group, the Laughing Mask, to have him killed. However, Scarlet already gave him a name, Chase, and let him stay by her side.

skill.name: I'll Break You!
skill.description: Prevents the target from receiving positive effects for 4 seconds, and attacks to inflict 193762 P.DMG and knocks the target back. Inflicts 74425 P.DMG after 1 second to enemies around the target and stuns them for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Remove Limit
skill.description: Upon activation, [Remove Limit] takes effects. When activated, consumes 10% of current HP to remove all negative effects on self and deals 201833 P.DMG to nearby enemies in range. While [Remove Limit] is activated, consumes 1.5% of current HP every 1 second, gains Immunity to CC, and increases Crit DMG by 50% and ATK Spd by 500, and enhances normal attacks. The HP consumption, Crit DMG and ATK Spd Boost grow stronger over time. This effect is irremovable, and is automatically deactivated when HP falls under 25% or below.

skill.name: Burn, Spear of Fury
skill.description: Charges at an enemy, dealing 130278 P.DMG and knocking it down. Affterward and explodes the ground around self to attack 4 times, dealing a total of 256944 P.DMG and inflicting Stun for 5 sec. Each hit recovers HP equal to 3% of Chase's Max HP + 25% of DMG.

skill.name: Remember This in Hell
skill.description: Chase is not affected by Lifesteal stats. Instead, increases self's Max HP by 20%, Crit Chance by 100, CC ACC by 100, and ACC by 100. Whenever HP drops by 1%, increaes Crit DMG 1% and ATK Spd by 4. Upon taking a fatal DMG by 40%, ATK Spd 400, and gaining immunity to CC for the duration. The resurrection effect can be activated only once in battle, and resurrected Chase cannot use skills.

name: Chrisha
description: Commander of Velchia, the proud Magic Knights of the Empire, and the Inquisitor working directly under the Emperor. It is her duty to eliminate corruption, rebels, and everything else that threatens the Empire. The people of the Empire praise her and think of her as a hero, a title she has never been eager to accept. As a daughter of the Van Nosenhill family, and as a soldier of the Empire, all that matters to her is fulfilling her duties.

skill.name: Light of Annihilation
skill.description: Deals 276148 M.DMG that ignores DEF to the target, and inflicts stun for 3 sec. Deals additional 199099 M.DMG that ignores DEF to Non-Hero targets. After use, removes all stacked Lights and gains irremovable Red Light.

skill.name: Enemy Blockade
skill.description: Dispels all negative effects from self, deals 70196 M.DMG to all enemies, and silences them for 1 sec. After use, removes all stacked Lights and gains irremovable Blue Light.

skill.name: Green Zone
skill.description: Deals 158988 M.DMG to frontal enemies in a straight line and creates a Green Zone ahead. Enemies in the Green Zone cannot receive positive effects and takes a total of 160980 M.DMG over 3 sec, having their Heal Rate reduced by 30%. After use, removes all stacked Lights and gains irremovable Green Light.

skill.name: Technomagic of the Empire
skill.description: Increases ATK by 7118 and ACC by 100 for all allies, and own normal attack effect changes according to the color of light owned. Red Light - Increases DMG of normal attack by 100%, and upon attack, reduces Cooldown of [Light of Annihilation] by 1 sec. Blue Light - Reduces DMG of normal attack by 50%, but deals DMG to the entire enemy. Targets take 30% increased M.DMG for 10 sec. Green Light - Reduces DMG of normal attack by 20%, but deals DMG to 2 enemies. Heal Rate of the target is reduced by 20% for 5 sec.

name: Clause
description: This upright and righteous man protects Orvel as one of its knights. Many people consider him a dependable defender of Orvel, but due to his lack of interest in wealth and success, his actual rank within the order has never been very high. He grew up together with Kasel and Frey in the same orphanage, and he loves his land as the home of those precious to him. He recently volunteered to join the expedition to investigate the King's Plains.

skill.name: Cut Ground
skill.description: Leaps into the air and deals 100454 P.DMG to enemies in range, stunning them for 3 sec.

skill.name: Shield Strike
skill.description: Deals 153118 P.DMG proportional to DEF to enemies in range and knocks them back. Hit enemies' DEF is reduced by 30%. Upon blocking an attack, skill cooldown is reduced by 0.5 sec.

skill.name: Guardian Shield
skill.description: All allies' P.DEF is increased by 18044 for 20 sec and P.Crit Resistance is increased by 30%.

skill.name: Vow of Knights
skill.description: Upon blocking, deals 18655 P.DMG to frontal enemies and decreases ATK of affected targets by 20% for 8 sec. Recovers 300 MP after hitting the target.

name: Cleo
description: Cleo's earliest memory begins at the Tower of Sage. Raised by Dominiks the Great Sage as an orphan, she is both a genius wizard and a troublemaker. Her inability to control her own power has often led to trouble, including partial destruction of the Red Tower, her own residence. Despite this, her apparent immunity to the wrath of the Great Sage has caused her to be ostracized from her peers. Although this has led her to become selfish and inconsiderate, deep inside, she is still a kindhearted girl who fears abandonment by others.

skill.name: Fire Needle
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 5 times to deal a total of 482115 M.DMG. Recovers own Mana by 100 upon a Critical Hit.

skill.name: Fire Ball
skill.description: Attacks the target and the enemies in nearby range, dealing 431029 M.DMG and stunning them for 2 sec. Deals 667081 additional M.DMG to Bosses.

skill.name: Fire Rain
skill.description: Attacks all enemies 5 times, dealing a total of 957270 M.DMG. This attack deals 150% increased Crit DMG.

skill.name: Flame Diffusion
skill.description: Inflicts a stack of Ember upon hitting an enemy. Enemies affected by Ember take 321520 M.DMG over 20 seconds. Ember can be stacked up to max 10 times.

name: Crow
description: Code name: Hound. A bounty hunter known as the hound of hell. It is said that no one can escape from this former Imperial Navy officer once he targets them. The only consolation for criminals is that this man isn’t motivated by their bounties alone. While there are many theories, the most convincing one is that he’s after revenge. There are moments when this cold-hearted man seems to warm up, they say. It's when he pulls out an old pendant, which nobody has actually seen.

skill.name: Target will be Eliminated.
skill.description: Deals a total of 184725 P.DMG to enemies in front over 15 times and leaves 2 'Hunting Dog's Fang Marks' for 40 sec. Hunting Dog's Fang Mark stacks up to max 100 times.

skill.name: Struggle is Meaningless.
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 10 times and deals a total of 220010 P.DMG. Shoots a Frost Bullet that deals 123175 P.DMG to target and surrounding enemies, freezing them for 4 sec. The special Frost Bullet creates a freezing area for 6 seconds that deals 58962 P.DMG every 2 sec, with a 50% chance to freeze for 2 sec.

skill.name: Even Gods shall Die.
skill.description: Takes position and focuses to shoot a laser, dealing 217937 P.DMG to frontal enemies within range, and consumes target's stack of Hunting Dog's Fang Mark to deal 5947 additional P.DMG per each stack. Depending on the focusing time, the effect's range increases, and DMG is increased up to max 100%. Once the focus is completed, knocks back the enemy far away.

skill.name: Hunting Preparation
skill.description: Crow is not affected by changes in ATK Spd. ATK increases by 28496 and Crit DMG by 80%. Recovers 300 Mana every second. It also leaves a 'Hunting Dog's Fang Mark' to target for 40 sec when dealing a normal attack.

name: Dakaris
description: As the Empire expanded its territory, the long occupying natives resisted relentlessly. However, they all eventually fell before the Empire's brutal military force as well as overwhelming technology. Dakaris' homeland, the reclusive Lake Eretana, hidden deep inside the mountains, was no exception. The Empire let the natives stay in their land, but by no means were they treated with respect. To make things worse, the officers and nobles appointed to the area were mostly corrupted, making it even more difficult for the natives. The noble appointed to Lake Eretana was especially the worse. The atrocities grew worse each day, eventually leading to the deaths of young, and innocent Lizardmen. This lead Dakaris to gather his tribe to get back their freedom. 'To soothe the spirits of my ancestors, and to liberate my tribe - I will not hesitate, I will take back our rightful future with the Resistance.' Currently, he is a key member of the Resistance, leading them with his wisdom and insight.

skill.name: Judgment Upon Them!
skill.description: Deals 210887 M. DMG to the target and enemies nearby, stunning them for 1 sec and healing allies within the range by 146784 HP. Activating [Grant Me Strength!] will reset Cooldown of this Skill, and remove Cooldown up to 3 Skill uses.

skill.name: Grant Me Strength!
skill.description: Over 10 sec, heals own HP by 614290 and recovers 2 orbs of Mana, increasing ATK by 91907 for the duration. If own HP is full upon activation, casts a shield that blocks 131493 DMG and grants CC Immunity for 5 sec. If there are 3 or less allies, this effect will apply to all allies.

skill.name: May Their Agony End!
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 5 times, dealing 734270 M.DMG in total. If the target is not a Hero, deals additional 230620 M.DMG. While [Grant Me Strength!] is active, an enemy with highest ATK will be prioritized.

skill.name: Might of the Ancestors!
skill.description: If own HP is full, increases ATK by 83351. If not, heals own HP by 44253 every sec. Upon taking a fatal damage, consumes entire Mana to cast a shield that blocks 654722 DMG and grants CC Immunity for 5 sec. While the shield is active, Dakaris cannot recover Mana.

name: Dark Lord Kasel
description: The new Dark Lord that was born when the seed of the Dark Lord concealed within the Holy Sword finally corrupted Kasel. His actions have an almost mechanic feel to them as if he is repressing the newly crowned Dark Lord Kasel's will. As the Dark Lord had the power to multiply his vessel's potential explosively, he used Kasel's remarkable power that exceeded Kyle's to fully embrace the purpose of destroying Lua's artifacts that protects the world, which was planted within the Dark Lord's instinct by the goddess Lea. He soon grew to be a formidable enemy, firmly establishing his position as a new Dark Lord.

skill.name: Judgement Blade
skill.description: Attacks frontal enemies in a straight line 2 times, dealing a total of 238440 P.DMG and preventing enemies from recovering Mana for 2 sec. [Dark Lord] Additionally attacks enemies in wide range 1 time, dealing 210711 P.DMG and knocking them down for 3 sec. Requires 5 or more stacks of [Dark Energy] for use.

skill.name: Doom
skill.description: Explodes darkess and attacks frontal enemies in a straight line 3 times, dealing a total of 353940 P.DMG and knocking them away for 3 sec. [Dark Lord] Deals 192720 P.DMG to 1 enemy furthest away and pulls it in front of self, exploding Darkness afterward. Requires 15 or more stacks of [Dark Energy] for use.

skill.name: Advent of the Dark Lord
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from self and enter into an irremovable [Dark Lord] state for 20 sec, dealing 192720 P.DMG to nearby enemies in circular range of self. During [Dark Lord] state, all skills are enhanced, gains immunity to CC, and normal attacks deal 23013 additional P.DMG each hit. Requires 25 or more stacks of [Dark Energy] for use. Upon use, consume all stacks to increase own ATK by 2000 and DEF Penetration by 10 per stack.

skill.name: One Fallen to Darkness
skill.description: Although Dark Lord Kasel cannot recover Mana since he is granted with the power of Darkness, his ATK increases by 39655, deals attacks that always hit, and requires [Dark Energy] stacks to use Skills. Normal attacks grant [Dark Energy] stacks. [Dark Energy] can be stacked up to max 40 times and is irremovable.

name: Demia
description: Ziltrion Si Demia. The commander of the Guardian Knights of Orvel. She is a mighty and dignified knight who wields a lance and a giant shield. It is said that penetrating her shield is next to impossible. As a knight commander, she cherishes her subordinates, and is prepared to perform any task in service of her land. Having felt the recent change of the atmosphere within the royal palace, she hopes to quickly appoint Clause as the next commander so that she may protect Scarlet from the aggression of the nobles.

skill.name: Penetration
skill.description: Throws a spear at the furthest enemy, dealing 61272 P.DMG and drawing the enemy in front of the hero. Then deals 40920 P.DMG to enemies in range, stunning them for 3 sec.

skill.name: Will to Win
skill.description: Upon blocking enemy attack for 15 sec, triggers a shockwave that deals 36927 P.DMG to enemies in range, reducing their ATK by 20%.

skill.name: Steel Fortress
skill.description: Upon DMG block during casting, jump attack DMG is increased by 7%. Also, deals 49076 P.DMG to enemy and inflicts stun. After casting, jumps and attacks the enemy, dealing 181181 P.DMG and stunning them for 4 sec. Gains immunity to CC while the skill is in use.

skill.name: Spearhead
skill.description: All allies' P.DEF is increased by 7118 and P.Block chance is increased by 250.

name: Dimael
description: This lonely Dark Elf swore vengeance against his own race for the death of his sister. Having barely survived his deployment to the Aegina Desert, the only thing waiting for him back home was the dreadful news that his sister had been killed as an Elven sacrifice. As he cried out her name in the darkness, he began succumbing to madness. Eventually, he swore an oath of hatred and vengeance against his own kind, the murderers of his sister.

skill.name: Dark Rampage
skill.description: Deals 535290 M.DMG to an enemy.

skill.name: Black Shackle
skill.description: Deals 333668 M.DMG to enemies in range and shackles them for 6 sec.

skill.name: Shadow Wave
skill.description: Deals 393125 M.DMG to enemies in a straight line and inflicts Blind for 6 sec.

skill.name: Black Stain
skill.description: Each auto attack deals extra 41573 M.DMG that ignores target's M.DEF.

name: Dosarta
description: A sentinel of Elidora Kingdom guarding the Tower of Challenge. According to the rules, those from a royal family in the position of guardian almost never get released from their duty before their service ends, but desperate times call for all sorts of exceptions. Dosarta was allowed to leave the Tower of Challenge to carry out missions if need be, and now she's determined to use the opportunity to make a lot of friends. How many friends could this Elven guardian make?

skill.name: This Will Hurt!
skill.description: After increasing CC Resist of allies within self's range by 200 for 10 sec, attacks enemies to deal 268437 M.DMG and causes them to take 30% increased M.DMG for 10 sec. Hit enemies become unable to recover Mana for 3 sec.

skill.name: On Guard!
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from all allies and increases P.DEF by 15674 + 4% of Dosarta's ATK for 10 sec.

skill.name: Hya! Kya! Take this!
skill.description: Attacks a target 4 times, dealing a total of 868500 M.DMG and stunning it for 4 sec. Afterward, launches a final attack on frontal enemies within range, dealing 293159 M.DMG and pulling them to the center. Against Non-Hero enemies, each attack deals additional 150072 M.DMG that ignores DEF.

skill.name: Let Us Challenge Together!
skill.description: Upon blocking, reduces Cooldown of self's active Skills by 1 sec and increases P.DEF of self by 8781 + 1% of Dosarta's ATK for 4 sec. A 6 -sec Cooldown will be applied.

name: Epis
description: This playful and bewitching succubus acts on her own whims. As expected of her Demon lineage, she is a hedonist driven by what she finds fun and enjoyable. Even during the Demon War, she chose traveling around on her own over joining the invasion. In her eyes, fighting alongside Kyle was interesting enough for her to even betray her own kind. When she later met Kasel, she gladly joined his party, knowing that she found another fun adventure for herself. When she finds attractive men, she sometimes visits them in their dreams.

skill.name: Absorbing Blow
skill.description: Deals 330336 M.DMG that ignores enemy DEF, and heals 25% of DMG as HP.

skill.name: Nightmare
skill.description: Moves behind the furthest enemy and deals 183572 M.DMG. Hit enemies take 30% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.

skill.name: Devil's Prom
skill.description: Deals 695356 M.DMG to all enemies in range. Gains CC immunity while using this skill.

skill.name: Harvest
skill.description: When an enemy is killed by this hero, ATK is increased by 16381 for 12 sec, and all skill cooldown is reduced by 30%.

name: Erze
description: Born the second daughter of the ShadowHilt family, Erze also chose to become a vampire hunter after her beloved sister Seria. Erze's feeble frame kept her from learning how to fight with swords, but she managed to become known as a hunter with her talents in magic. One day she fell into a trap during an operation and was bitten by a mysterious vampire on the shoulder. Her weak constitution grew worse, and she suffered from frequent headaches and thirst every night. Erze knew what this meant and what would end up happening to her. She hid the bite and tried to find a cure on her own, distancing herself from her comrades in her efforts. Meanwhile, Seria was dispatched to Windland Snow Mountain to investigate the Vampire Princess that went missing 100 years ago. On the day her sister left... - Ahh, Seria... I cannot control it anymore... Erze quietly and secretly started slitting the throats of her comrades.

skill.name: Sweet Blood
skill.description: Deals 117655 P.DMG to all enemies and Lifesteals HP equal to 10% of DMG dealt. Each hit reduces Cooldown of [Sweet Blood] by 0.5 sec and grants 1 irremovable stack of [Sweet Blood]. [Sweet Blood] can be stacked up to max 5 times, and using the Skill with 5 stacks of [Sweet Blood] grants 1 additional hit and removes [Sweet Blood] stacks.

skill.name: Soaking Blood
skill.description: Dispels all negative effects and gains immunity to all CCs, P.DMG, and M.DMG for 5 sec. Inflicts 1 stack of [Soaking Blood] on all enemies, and additional 1 stack upon attacking a target with [Soaking Blood]. [Soaking Blood] can be stacked up to 6 times. Deals 86617 P.DMG to enemies with [Soaking Blood] stacks after 5 sec, and steals HP equal to 25% of the DMG dealt. For every 3 stack(s) of [Soaking Blood], hit count increases by 1 and removes [Soaking Blood] stacks upon attacking.

skill.name: Blood Liberation
skill.description: Deals 45471 P.DMG to all enemies every 1 sec for 10 sec. Each hit of [Blood Liberation] causes an additional hit on 1 random enemy.

skill.name: Life Drinker
skill.description: Increases ATK by 4748 and Max HP by 23748 upon killing an enemy. Stacks up to max 50. Upon taking fatal DMG, casts [Soaking Blood], and decreases Max HP by 40%. This effect is not applied when [Soaking Blood] is in cooldown. This skill consumes all Mana upon activation.

name: Esker
description: Born with the spirit of a wandering artist, Esker was a star magician of the Stardust, a wandering theater troupe, until he was framed by Prime Minister El Moriham of Orvelia and disappeared. Just when everyone started forgetting about him, he came out to the world as one of the most dangerous gamblers in the secret gambling world. 'The Illusion Gambler.' That was what his challengers called him, trembling in fear. The gamblers that played with him all described him in a similar manner. As soon as they faced Esker's unique laughter, his soft voice, and his empty eyes, they all felt nauseated by the suspicion that the man in the front was reading their every move.

skill.name: This Is My Game
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 3 times, dealing 122090 M.DMG and stunning it for 3 sec. If the 3 attacks land on the same enemy, deals additional 256654 M.DMG that ignores DEF.

skill.name: My Turn
skill.description: Rolls the dice and increases ATK and Crit DMG of 2 random allies by 4748 and 7% respectively for 60 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times, and the number of targets increases by 1 per 1 pip on the rolled dice.

skill.name: Shall I Try My Luck?
skill.description: Attacks all enemies and deals 377720 M.DMG, permanently reducing Cooldown of this skill by 2 sec or increasing its DMG by 30%, each with a 50% chance. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.

skill.name: This Is Not a Trick
skill.description: Every 10 sec, increases own ATK by 4274 and DEF by 2611. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.

name: Evan
description: The Gretchen family is a high-ranking vampire family that is called as the guardian of wisdom and the pursuer of knowledge. They have poured their efforts into the study and knowledge of magic for centuries. While they were the distant relatives of the princess Lewisia, they always have upheld the rule of not interfering with the humans, as they believed humans were fools who were swayed by greed. But when the current head of the family, Vilhelmina La Gretchen, married a human, their immense knowledge that was concealed for centuries finally became accessible to humans. Barsi, the human who married Vilhelmina and took on her surname, was an alchemist of the Tower of Sage. He had been studying the beings of darkness which the vampires commanded and the darkness that had spread in the world. When he first heard rumors of the Gretchen family, he went to them and asked to become their student. After many incidents, Vilhelmina and Barsi soon became fast friends and came to love each other deeply. That is how Evan La Gretchen, one of the most brilliant minds among the Tower of Sage alchemists as well as the half-blood child of Vilhelmina and the human alchemist Barsi, was born. Unfortunately, Evan was weak from birth. Although he had inherited his mother's great darkness, his body was the same as a human, and therefore couldn't bear the dark power. He was always on the verge of death, and he couldn't even walk properly. In addition, since one of the properties of darkness was absorption, he was in constant danger of being devoured by his mother's power. After thinking about it for some time, Barsi took Evan and returned to the Tower of Sage, while Vilhelmina remained in her castle and continued to seek a way that her son could live more safely. Thankfully, Evan grew to be optimistic and positive, just like his father and showed interest in researching darkness. As he grew older, he tried to control the darkness within him. He acquired extensive knowledge of runes, alchemy, and elemental magic, becoming the greatest alchemist of the Tower of Sage at the age of 15. The only thing that he couldn't use was the magic that controls blood. Although the blood of a high-ranking vampire flowed through his veins, his body was too weak to hold up against the use of such magic. Despite this fact, he has achieved countless accomplishments, such as creating his own homunculus Naav Gehen as well as studying and observing the darkness that effects the world with Lewisia. To commend his talent and accomplishments, the Tower of Sage granted him the title of 'Green', meaning 'Researcher' - an honorable title given only to those who have attained incredible success with their research. While he still sometimes experiences slight pains and aches due to his inherently weak body when the power of darkness becomes stronger, nonetheless he has learned to survive without the help of his parents. Now, he is able to use his power of darkness freely and shows interest in the demonic energy of demons and the power of dragons as well. He also discovered a new type of darkness that is completely different from the currently existing darkness and named it 'Tidhar'. Until recently, Evan had been staying at the Tower of Sage, continuing his research on darkness, and keeping a close eye on the 'Eclipse phenomenon' discovered in the Aegina Desert. When he received a letter from Lewisia asking him for help on the darkness that appeared in the desert, he left for the sandy lands with Naav Gehen by his side.

skill.name: Purification of Life
skill.description: Heals HP of all allies by 10122 and increases Heal Rate of healed allies by 25% for 15 sec.

skill.name: Uproar of Naav Gehen
skill.description: Deals 103357 P.DMG to all enemies and increases P.DMG the hit enemies take by 25% for 10 sec.

skill.name: Magic Circle of Life
skill.description: Places a magic circle in a wide range of self for 12 sec, healing HP of all allies within range by 42890 every sec and increasing their ATK Spd by 500.

skill.name: Naav Gehen of Gluttony
skill.description: Deals 51983 P.DMG to the enemy and enemies within a wide range of the target, dispelling positiv effects from hit enemies and places a magic circle for 12 sec. The magic circle deals 48431 P.DMG to enemies within range and reduces ATK by 20% every sec.

skill.name: Origin of Life
skill.description: Creates a shield that absorbs 318005 DMG and recovers 100 mana every sec for 15 sec on all allies. For the duration of the Shield, gains immmunity to CC.

skill.name: Rampage of Naav Gehen
skill.description: Deals a total of 333474 P.DMG over 6 times to enemies within a wide range of the target and inflicts Stun for 2 sec. The last hit deals 166993 P.DMG and inflicts Stun for 5 sec.

skill.name: Alchemy of Green
skill.description: At the beginning of each battle, heals HP of all allies by 215154 and reduces P.DMG they take by 15% for 20 sec. [Alchemist of the Green Evan] Purification of Life, Magic Circle of Life, and Origin of Life become available for use. After Skill use, Evan turns into 'Alchemist of the Dark Evan.' [Alchemist of the Dark Evan] Uproar of Naav Gehen, Naav Gehen of Gluttony, and Rampage of Naav Gehen become available for use. After skill use, Evan turns into 'Alchemist of the Green Evan.'

name: Ezekiel
description: The son of Lucikiel is a powerful Demon officer who brought down the Republic of Gray. Usually considerate and careful, he is actually half Human. In battle, his Demon blood takes over, turning him arrogant and violent. He inherited this power from his father, whom he never even knew. However, he takes pride in his power and does not try to hide it. Since he is only partly Demon, only a single arm undergoes the transformation. However, even just this single arm contains immense power, and it's certainly not easy for him to fully control it yet. If he loses the control of the arm, the only wise decision is to immediately get as far away from him as possible.

skill.name: Destructive Instinct
skill.description: Swipes nearby enemies in a circular range and deals 146299 M.DMG. Then strikes the ground, dealing 190017 M.DMG and knocking down enemies for 3 sec. [Fury] - Consumes 15% of current HP to activate. Effect range increases and swipe attack draws in enemies.

skill.name: Dawning Despair
skill.description: Dashes to an enemy with the highest ATK and deals 304072 M.DMG to enemies in range, reducing their ATK Spd by 300. [Fury] - Consumes 10% of current HP to activate. Effect range increases, Stuns target for 3 sec, and increases own ATK Spd by 300 for 10 sec.

skill.name: Strike of Doom
skill.description: Charges energy and attacks the enemy, dealing 331722 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec. This DMG ignores the target's DMG Reduction effect. [Fury] - Consumes 20% of current HP to activate. Attacks enemies in range of target and DMG is tripled.

skill.name: Cursed Blood
skill.description: Ezekiel gains 1 stack of 'Cursed Blood' at the end of Skill. At 3 stacks, consumes Cursed Blood to reset Cooldown of all Skills, dealing 247808 M.DMG to nearby enemies, knocking them down for 3 sec, and activating Fury for 10 sec. Fury is irremovable. While in Fury state, Ezekiel goes into auto-battle mdoe that cannot be controlled, increasing ATK by 126581, DMG of normal attacks by x2, and enhancing all Skill effects. During Fury state, Skill use does not grant a stack of Cursed Blood, but killing an enemy will grant a stack.

name: Fallen Frey
description: A being that always remains by the Dark Lord's side, and would follow him through anything. Although she was an exceptional priestess and was expected to do great things, she fell into despair and rage when the goddess Lua abandoned Kasel. She corrupted herself by unleashing the darkness that she had bound deep within her soul. At the same time, all the memories of her past life came back to her, and she realized why she had such a strong divine power, but she could no longer go back to the days when she blindly followed the goddess. The divine power within her turned into demonic energy fueled with rage and hatred, and her once-devout faith became shattered by sadness and confusion. The corruption that was foretold the moment Frey descended to the World Tree...Frey turned her back to Lua's will that commanded her to protect the Warrior of the Holy Sword, and instead, accompanies the Dark Lord on his path, for that is what her heart desires. All while keeping the unwavering vow that she will walk the same path Kasel walks, forever.

skill.name: Light of Doom
skill.description: Heals HP of the ally with the lowest HP and nearby allies by 402686 and increases Heal Rate by 20% for 10 sec. Afterward, explodes the area around the target and deals 194058 M.DMG to enemies in range, reducing their Heal Rate by 20% for sec. If this Skill is used with 1 or more stacks of [Darkened Power], consumes 1 stack and dispels positive effects of all enemies within range.

skill.name: Blessing of Doom
skill.description: Grants [Blessing of Doom] to 4 allies with the lowest HP, absorbing 428716 DMG for 10 sec. The shield grants immunity to CC and increases ATK Spd by 500 for the duration. If this Skill is used with 1 or more stacks of [Darkened Power], consumes 1 stack to dispel negative effects from self and additionally dispels negative effects from targets.

skill.name: Heaven's Vengeance
skill.description: Brings Heaven's Vengeance upon a random enemy and nearby enemies over 20 hits, dealing 67184 M.DMG each hit and increases All DMG the target takes by 10% for 20 sec. 500 additional DEF Penetration applies to this Skill. If this skill is used with 1 or more stacks of [Darkened Power], consumes 1 stack and inflicts Stun on the hit enemies for 0.5 sec each hit. The DMG Boost effect can be stacked up to max 5 times.

skill.name: Tainted Angel
skill.description: As Fallen Frey has been corrupted by the darkness, she takes 15% increased DMG, but she recovers 400 Mana every sec, and when her Mana is at 100%, she gains [Darkened Power] every sec. [Darkened Power] can be stacked up to max 2 times and is irremovable.

name: Fluss
description: As the son of the commander of the Imperial Knights, he has received rigorous training since early childhood to become a proper swordsman. No one can question his title as the fastest swordsman in the imperial palace. The number of enemy knights he felled in the fields of battle is a testament to his skills. He quickly rose to the rank as the vice-captain of the Imperial Guard and is the subject of everyone's admiration. Although he is aware of his beautiful appearance, he detests those who approach him for his outer beauty. He considers inner beauty more important than what is visible. However, he's slightly hypocritical in that he occasionally falls for his own beauty.

skill.name: Tempest Blade
skill.description: Attacks the target and the enemies near it 3 times, dealing a total of 320892 P.DMG. If the target is not a Hero, inflicts a total of 445640 additional P.DMG over 5 sec.

skill.name: Flashstep
skill.description: Moves to the enemy with the highest ATK, dispels positive effects from the target, inflicts Silence for 2 sec, and leaves a Mark for 10 sec. Afterwar, Fluss' all attacks prioritize the Marked target and deal 20598 P.DMG per attack. When the Marked target dies, resets Cooldown of this Skill and recovers 2000 Mana.

skill.name: Bloody Petals
skill.description: Deals a total of 742653 P.DMG to an enemy over 16 hits, and suppresses the target while casting. This DMG ignores the target's Block effects.

skill.name: Spell Cutter
skill.description: Increases own M.DEF by 11874. Upon taking M.DMG, deals 118767 P.DMG to the attacker, reduces its ATK by 30% for 5 sec, and dodges All M.DMG for 3 sec. This effect activates only once every 10 sec.

name: Frey
description: An apprentice priestess serving the Goddess Lua, the church has high expectations of her as a future priestess. From the early years of her training, she has amazed even the high priests with her strong faith and natural talent for channeling Lua's power. She herself considers priesthood her destined path, and her kind heart reflects her resolve. However, she shows no mercy toward evildoers.

skill.name: Miraculous Light
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from the ally with the lowest HP, healing HP of the target by 607131 and HP of allies nearby equal to 40% of Heal Rate.

skill.name: Blessings of Light
skill.description: Casts a shield that absorbs 318005 DMG for 12 sec on all allies. While the shield is active, the target increases its ATK by 20%, Heal Rate by 50%, and gains immunity to CC.

skill.name: Heaven's Vengeance
skill.description: Attacks the target and its nearby enemies 6 times, dealing up to 67756 M.DMG. 500 additional Crit Chance applies to this Skill. Hit targets are blinded for 6 sec and take 25% increased All DMG for 10 sec.

skill.name: Goddess Grace
skill.description: Reduces All DMG taken by 15%. At the beginning of each battle, and every 15 sec, increases M.DEF of 1 ally with the lowest HP by 10918 for 10 sec and heals HP of the target by 15% for the duration on Skill.

name: Gau
description: Gau is a powerful warrior from the Barbarian Kingdom. Whenever he swung his twin axes, a bloodbath would follow. As a warrior, he was feared for his peerless ferocity. However, he suddenly disappeared for 10 years. When he returned, he was a completely changed man. His violent Barbarian tendencies were all gone, even when others criticized him. Instead, he now faces them with smiles and jolly laughter. The kind, warm gaze he now shows to children and animals is especially surprising.

skill.name: Smash
skill.description: Deals 230826 P.DMG to enemies within range, and the first attack knocks them down for 3 sec and reduces DEF Penetration by 250 for 10 sec.

skill.name: Battle Roar
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from all allies, increases their ATK by 49866, ATK Spd by 300, and P.DEF by 16622 for 15 sec.

skill.name: Vortex
skill.description: Charges to the front, dealing 606876 P.DMG over 12 times to nearby enemies within circular range of self and draws them in during casting. While using this Skill, gains immunity to CC, and the last attack freezes the enemy for 4 sec.

skill.name: Enrage
skill.description: Increases own ATK by 3792, CC Resist by 30, and DMG dealt to Non-Hero enemies by 1.5% every sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 20 times. At 20 stacks or more, increases DMG of normal attacks by 100%.

name: Gladi
description: The man who conquered the Orvel Arena. Sitting on the throne of the champion, he is often feared by others. People refer to him as Beast Fist. However, he is actually a cheerful man with a positive and straightforward personality. As reflected by his fighting style, he is a bold man who does not hesitate to act upon his will. After his conquest, Gladi requested the right to run an Arena Shop. Supposedly, his real goal was to gain a monopoly on silvervines. It still remains a mystery as to who will actually buy these plants, but he seems happy enough. Curiously enough, he's currently not even selling any silvervines.

skill.name: Quick Strikes
skill.description: Strikes the target 7 times, dealing a total of 522900 P.DMG. The last hit increases the target's P.DMG taken by 25% for 10 sec.

skill.name: Advent of the War God
skill.description: Dispel all negative effects on self and deal 235546 P.DMG to nearby enemies within a small radius, gaining the Status 'War God' for 10 sec. While in War God mode, ATK is boosted by 36329 and all auto attacks have a 30% chance to consume 5% mana to deal an extra attack of 129987 extra P.DMG. Upon taking M.DMG, dodge all M.DMG for 1 sec. Dodge effect only activates 1 time in every 2 sec.

skill.name: Ultimate Punch!
skill.description: Charges energy and sprints toward frontal enemies, dealing 544060 P.DMG to enemies in range and inflicting stun for 3 sec. If the target is a boss, attack ignores target DEF.

skill.name: This will hurt!
skill.description: Upon hitting a single target with 5 auto attacks, deals 65548 extra DMG that ignores DEF.

name: Glenwys
description: If you ask the citizens of the Empire to pick a knight that they love the most, Glenwys's name will be on the top of the list. She is a Vice Captain in Empire Capital Guard Knights, the highest post taken by a knight with a background as a commoner. With her fierce combat skills along with her modesty and strong sense of responsibility, being a knight is her calling of life. There's no doubt that Glenwys is the hope for all commoners of the Empire, considering that she earned her way to the position of Vice Captain and that she won the 3 fighting tournaments that the Emperor held himself. As a symbol of the belief that anyone with skills can achieve success in the Empire, she is receiving a lot of attention from many.

skill.name: That Is It
skill.description: Deals a total of 118440 P.DMG over 7 attacks to frontal enemies. Each attack increases P.DMG the enemies take by 4% for 10 sec. This effect stacks up to max 7 times. Deals additional 256249 P.DMG to Non-Hero target.

skill.name: I Will Not Stay My Hand
skill.description: Deals 278980 P.DMG over 10 attacks to nearby enemies in a circular range of self and stuns them for 1 sec. The final attack deals 87473 P.DMG to frontal enemies and stuns them for 3 sec.

skill.name: Time For Counterattack
skill.description: Calling upon the strength of the Imperial Shield, deals 269079 P.DMG to nearby enemies in a large circular range of self and knocks them down for 3 sec. Dispels negative effects from all allies, increases ATK by 22559 for 20 sec, and increases DEF by 10211.

skill.name: Pride of Imperial Knights
skill.description: Increases ATK of all allies by 8307. At the beginning of each battle, increases DMG to Non-Hero enemies by 10% for 20 sec, reducing DMG received by 10%.

name: Gremory
description: The goddess of destruction and chaos, Lea, took a portion of herself aside and shaped it into the beings called the Primal Demons to bring an everlasting end to the cycle. Gremory was the very first fragment to be born as the incarnation of disaster. She has been an unintentional contributor to keeping the peace of the Material World to this day. It was a great stroke of luck for all living creatures that this great Demon, who could create terrible calamities with a single gesture, was so lazy - for she took a completely different course of action from what Lea, who wished to bring an end to the cycle, had originally planned. Gremory wasn't interested in ending some cycle. There was no reason for her to become embedded in the cogwheels of the cycle, not when she had finally obtained a brand-new consciousness and life. Besides, the Material World contained many attractions, like fluffy blankets, exciting snacks and endless amounts of delightfully creative works. These irresistible temptations made Gremory, who was a slacker to her bones, become even lazier. To this day, she puts her small body, formed in a way to make moving around easier, on a comfy sofa and mumbles to herself. 'Work...? Sure, I'll do it... Right after the sequel of Deadly Sweet Laughning Strike Force comes out...'

skill.name: Pochi, bite them!
skill.description: Attacks an enemy 5 times, dealing 88995 M.DMG and inflicting [Pochi's Mark] each hit. The M.DMG of each hit increases by 15% per every stack of [Mana Charge]. [Pochi's Mark] reduces target's ATK by 6% for 15 sec, and it can be stacked up to max 5 times. If the target is a Boss, each hit deals 115492 additional M.DMG. The additional M.DMG increases by 30% per every stack of [Mana Charge]. This skill is sealed after use.

skill.name: Puchi, knock them away!
skill.description: Attacks the farthest enemy from behind, dealing 225218 M.DMG. Afterward, inflicts Stun for 5 sec and [Puchi's Mark] on the target. [Puchi's Mark] reduces the target's M.Block Chance by 500 for 12 sec. This skill is sealed after use.

skill.name: Pippi, wrap them!
skill.description: Deals a total of 560040 M.DMG over 10 times to the target and the enemies within a large are around the target, inflicting [Pippi's Mark] on hit target each hit. If this Skill deals DMG to a target inflicted with 10 stacks of [Pippi's Mark], each hit deals 39795 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF. [Pipi's Mark] increases M.DMG the target takes by 5% for 12 sec, and it can be stacked up to max 10 times. This Skill is sealed after use.

skill.name: Eh, wahtever. I'm gonna sleep.
skill.description: Available once all Skills are sealed. Upon use, dispels CC effects from self. While in use, Gremory gains immunity to CC, takes 40% reduced All DMG, and unlocks all of her sealed Skills. Every time she uses [Eh, whatever. I'm going to sleep.], she gains a [Mana Charge] stack. Each [Mana Charge] stack increases Gremory's DMG dealt to enemies by 2%. [Mana Charge] can be stacked up to max 5 times and is irremovable.

name: Hanus
description: Hanus was only 13 when the Guild Allied Forces recruited her. She is known as the legendary girl who was also called as the little giantess of the battlefield. As the daughter of the guild master of a weapon guild, Hanus used to play with discarded firearms and blades when she was young. This is when the others discovered her ingenuity in arms. The Guild Alliance decided that they cannot allow such profound talent to go to waste. The Alliance, after barely managing to convince Hanus' father who fiercely disagreed with the Alliance's decision, recruited her. Hanus was trained along with other soldiers, and just as the Guild had expected, she displaced her talent on battlefield. Hanus' revolutionary weapons were ridiculously strong enough to shift the paradigm of warfare. Her craftmanship, combined with her masterful tactics, marked the birth of an ultimate soldier of the Allied Forces. Moreover, Hanus herself vastly enjoyed her life in the army, as she could utilize her handcrafted weapons to their fullest. However, great talent meant more demands and battles to fight. During an operation, Hanus ended up being wounded. Upon hearing this news about her daughter's injury, Hanus' father who detested seeing his daughter in the army ever since the early days, raised his voice against the Alliance, and strongly demanded her daughter to be discharged from service at once. However, as people say, no parents are strong enough to bend their child's will. Hanus, who would rather die than be discharged from service, persistently persuaded her father. In the end, she managed to get her father's approval, under the condition that she stays in the military only as an instructor that doesn't participate in battles. Currently, Hanus thinks that her life as an instructor is not too bad at all, but deep inside, she still yearns to return to battlefields. Inside the Command Center, she silently awaits for the day when she will finally stand on the battlefield with comrades whom she taught.

skill.name: I See Through Your Every Move!
skill.description: Throws a grenade, and fires a submachine gun, dealing 235543 P.DMG to the target and the enemies nearby. Hanus gains 20 Ammo afterward. Hit enemies take 25% increased P.DMG for 10 sec, and are blinded for 4 sec. Ammo can be stacked up to max 300 times.

skill.name: Shoot You Full of Holes!
skill.description: Shoots a machine gun 10 times to frontal enemies in a wide area, dealing a total of 194520 P.DMG. Afterwards, if Hanus is possessing Ammo, she consumes 2 Ammo per shot to attack enemies until she runs out of Ammo. While in this state, Hanus takes 25% additional DMG. Every 1 st shot increases DMG of this Skill by 8%. The DMG Boost effect can be stacked up to max 50 times.

skill.name: Hide If You Can!
skill.description: Fires a mortar at a frontal area, dealing 363918 P.DMG in a wide area. Hanus gains 50 Ammo afterwards. Hit enemies are stunned for 5 sec. This Skill ignores target's P.Block and M.Block.

skill.name: I Shall Train You Hard!
skill.description: Hanus is not affected by ATK Spd effects, and increases ATK of all allies by 17811 + 5% of Hanus' ATK. If activated during Guild battles, this effect is amplified by 2 times. [Guild Battle] - Guild Raid, Guild Conquest, Guild War

name: Hilda
description:
Project: Brunhild started long ago in the early ages of the Technomagic Kingdom by the royal family, who feared the coming of the cycle's end. The first step of the project was to make a vessel that could contain the authority of god so that they could create 'an imitation god would do the bidding of the humans.'
Though they created various synthetic Demon Beasts, Golems, and even humans, every one of their subjects failed to retain their form and ended up falling to pieces. The scientists of the research facility turned their attention to the powerful beings called 'Transcendants,' who were already close to the source. With the data of the Transcendants gathered by the kingdom, the scientists created Hilda, an artifical Transcendant.
Hilda was simply a tool to create a new world; her purpose was to escapoe the cycle and destroy the current rules. She existed only as a 'weapon' to oppose the current goddess and therefore was not granted a personality or a will of her own. She spend her entire life in a deep slumber, except when she was undergoing adjustment to prepare her for the title of god or when she was being brainwashed to think a certain way, starting from a cold test tube and later locked up in the research facility.
Trapped in an endless cycle of sleeping and waking up, Hilda chose to accept her identity as aweapon to protect her sanity instead of trying to learn names of her emotions. Project: Brynhild was shut down right before the completion of the new god. Itwas none other by command of the new ruler of the kingdom, Siegfried Felix Liesnel...

skill.name: Void Whirlwind
skill.description: Deals a total of 302832 M.DMG over 12 hits to frontal enemies. Each hit reduces the targets Mana by 150.

skill.name: Transcendant
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from self and deals 93166 M.DMG to all enemies, entering [Transcendant] state and enhancing normal attacks. During [Transcendant] state, Hilda cannot use Skills, gains immunity to CC, and her normal attacks inflict [Void] stacks that can be stacks up to max 20 times on the target. Hilda also reduces Heal Rate of nearby enemies within circular range by 30%, and consumes own mana by 100 every sec. The mana consumption gradually increases over time, and [Transcendant] state deactivates upon consuming all Mana or using a Skill.

skill.name: Deactivate Transcendant
skill.description: Deactivates [Transcendant] and applies 8 sec Cooldown to the [Transcendant] Skill. This skill activates automatically upon consuming all Mana.

skill.name: Void Strike
skill.description: Deals 332668 M.DMG to frontal enemies within circular range of self and knocks them down for 3 sec. Upon hitting an enemy inflicted with [Void], consumes all Void stacks from the target and deals 13762 additional M.DMG per stack

skill.name: Void Frenzy
skill.description: Increases ATK by 42740, applies all Mana recovery at 50% higher, and increases DEF Penetration by 100 per orb of Mana Hilda has. At max Mana, Hilda enters [Void Frenzy] state for 10 sec. For the duration, self's all attacks ignore Block effects of enemies and fixes the DEF Penetration boost per Mana orb to 1000. [Void Frenzy] state has a Cooldown of 15 sec.

name: Isolet
description: A witch who's associated with Pandora. Scarred by the dark side of the Empire that encourages scrificing small for the greater good, Isolet's mind delved deeper into the abyss as she directly faced the ambivalenve of the Empire. Isolet is equipped with great knowledge which she gained from being a witch, truths of the world she found out in secret, and the great power granted to her by Pandora. Carrying a deep feeling of loss in her heart, Isolet wields her weapon and proceeds to the execution site to punish the hypocrites who oppress the weak. Her elemental spells have become more powerful through the mechines Pnadora gave her. She is also among the few people who can provide a large amount of Mana to the hearts of Pandora's automata to make them do her bidding. Both the Empire and Pandora desire Isolet for her invaluable knowledge and power. Whenever she reminisces about the Witch Association, which is her family and her hime, her eyes tend to soften. But the bloody path she has walked as the executioner of Pandora binds her with its cold chains.

skill.name: Devouring Flame - Caienne
skill.description: Deals 171674 P.DMG to frontal enemies and inflicts them with [Ignite]. Enemies inflicted with [Ignite] have their Heal Rate reduced by 25% for 7s.

skill.name: Frost of Absolute Zero - Devion
skill.description: Deals a total of 340735 P.DMG to frontal enemies over 5 times, freezing the targets for 3 sec each hit. Dealing DMG to an enemy inflicted by [Ignite] creates [Explosive Reaction] that deals 57430 additional DMG that ignores DEF.

skill.name: Raging Storm - Icarus
skill.description: Deals 40422 P.DMG each hit over 20 times to frontal enemies for 10 sec, reducing ATK of targets by 15% for 10s. Upon dealing DMG to an enemy inflicted with [Ignite], the Skill changes to [Blazing Storm], dealing 80853 P.DMG and reducing enemy’s Heal Rate by 1.5% for 60 sec each hit. This effect can be stacked up to max 30 times.

skill.name: Quintessence of Technomagic
skill.description: Isolet’s ATK Spd is fixed to 1000 and she is not affected by Skill Cooldown Reduction effects, by she recovers 1500 Mana and increases her Crit DMG by 100% every time she uses a Skill. When she creates [Explosive Reaction], her ATK increases by 4%. This effect can be stacked up to max 15 times and is irremovable. When she creates [Blazing Storm], M.DMG all allies take is reduced by 7%. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremovable.

name: Jane
description: She was once the princess of the fallen Republic of Gray. The Republic of Gray, wiped off the map by the Demon invaders during the Demon War, was the protector of countless secrets, including the ruins and technologies of an ancient civilization. Jane, too, lost her life to protect those secrets. Later, she was brought back to the world as an undead by Malduk, a high-ranking officer and a strategist of the Demon Army. She was given a new consciousness by a strange, dark magic. Now, she seeks to go on a journey to find her past self and her lost memories.

skill.name: Funeral Rites
skill.description: Deals 140671 M.DMG to enemies in range, stunning them for 3 sec.

skill.name: Mark of Death
skill.description: Engraves a Mark on all enemies for 30 sec and deals 105060 M.DMG over time. Enemies engraved with Mark takes 25% more M.DMG.

skill.name: Day of Ruin
skill.description: For 15 sec, deals a total of 41280 M.DMG to all enemies and recovers 100% of DMG as own HP. Gains immunity to CC. Marked enemies take increased DMG.

skill.name: Rest in Peace
skill.description: Upon taking a deathblow, enters a coffin for 5 sec and heals 463206 + 6% of Max HP. Gains immunity to all DMG while inside the coffin.

name: Juno
description: She's an ordinary young lady from the town, but her culinary skills are Orvel's finest. From the plain, wholesome food of the common people to the luxurious delicacies of the nobility, there isn't a dish she cannot cook. She once received an offer to work as the Royal Chef, but she refused it and opened an inn to let everyone enjoy her dishes. Her inn soon became one of the most famous attractions in Orvel, visited by countless adventurers. Now people call her inn 'the Hero's Inn,' and she's enjoying her life among the 'heroes.'

skill.name: Best Dish
skill.description: Removes negative effects from all allies, heals a total of 461902 HP over 7 second(s), and increases DEF by 9022. When there are 2 stacks or more [Excellent Ingredient], consumes 2 stacks to double the DEF Boost.

skill.name: Juno's Spicy Special
skill.description: Removes positive effects from all enemies, deals a total of 764220 P.DMG over 10 second(s), and enemies take 20% increased P.DMG. When there are 2 stacks or more [Excellent Ingredient], consumes 2 stacks to double the P.DMG that enemies take.

skill.name: Power-up
skill.description: Casts a shield on the ally with the lowest HP that absorbs 672692 DMG and grants Immunity to CC along with 1 orb of Mana. When there are 2 stacks or more [Excellent Ingredient], consumes 2 stacks to double the Mana Recovery.

skill.name: Help Yourself, Then Get Lost!
skill.description: Attacks the target and nearby enemies around it, dealing 278279 P.DMG and reducing their Mana by 1 orb. If the target is not a Hero, inflicts 367178 additional P.DMG that ignores DEF. When there are 2 stacks or more [Excellent Ingredient], consumes 2 stacks to double the Mana Reduction.

skill.name: Cook from Hell
skill.description: Removes all negative effects from self, heals 81783 HP, and transforms into a Cook from Hell. [Best Dish] and [Power-up] are changed to [Juno's Spicy Special] and [Help Yourself, Then Get Lost!] respectively. Gains 1 stack of irremovable [Excellent Ingredient]. When the skill is used again, transforms into a Cook from Heaven.

skill.name: Open for Business!
skill.description: While transformed into a Cook from Heaven, increases DEF of all allies by 6644 and their heal rate by 15%. While transformed into a Cook from Hell, reduces DEF of all enemies by 10% and their heal rate by 20%.

name: Kara
description: A human-type Golem that was made with ancient technomagic, but her appearance is just like that of a human girl. But she's an ancient weapon that has no feelings and was just made to be a tool. She was asleep in the ruins of an ancient civilization, deep underground in Galluah Plains. She was excavated by Annette, a technomagi in the Kingdom of Orvel, during her research and awakened in a new era with a new civilization...

skill.name: Anti-personnel Laser
skill.description: Attacks the target 4 times, dealing a total of 302976 M.DMG and inflicting knockback. Attacks all enemies with the last blow, dealing 151496 M.DMG and blowing them away for 3 seconds.

skill.name: Siege Laser
skill.description: Attacks the target inflicting 483353 M.DMG. Crit DMG is applied 200% higher.

skill.name: Wide-area Cannon
skill.description: Attacks a random target and nearby enemies in range 4 times, inflicting a total of 345276 M.DMG and stunning them for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Focused Fire
skill.description: Attacks a random target 15 times, inflicting a total of 331920 M.DMG, and inflicts Focused Fire for 20 seconds. Inflicts 737 extra M.DMG with each stack of Focused Fire on the enemy. Focused Fire can be stacked up to 30 times.

skill.name: Release Siege Weapon
skill.description: Kara turns into Siege Weapon mode and attacks the enemy, inflicting 35517 M.DMG with each hit. When in Siege Weapon mode, changes Anti-personnel Laser and Wide-area Cannon skills to Siege Laser and Focused Fire skills. When the skill is used again, returns to Anti-personnel Weapon mode.

skill.name: Essence of Technomagic
skill.description: While in [Anti-personnel Weapon] mode, increases All DEF by 28729, and while in [Siege Weapon] mode, increases DMG against bosses by 25%, takes 30% increased DMG from enemies, and gains immunity to CC. Dealing DMG to an enemy recovers 70 Mana each hit.

name: Kasel
description: A squire of the Kingdom of Orvelia. Traumatized by witnessing the deaths of his parents at the hands of the Demons invading the village, and later, the assassination of his sword teacher, he fears the idea of anyone around him dying. His past has driven him to seek out his sworn brother from his early years in the orphanage, Clause, who joined an expedition, but never returned.

skill.name: Judgment Blade
skill.description: Deals 202500 P.DMG 2 times to frontal enemies in a circle and knocks them down for 2.5 sec.

skill.name: Valiant Dash
skill.description: Attacks the target 3 times, and then charges behind them to deal 265089 P.DMG.

skill.name: Proxy of God
skill.description: Deals 75830 P.DMG to nearby enemies and inflicts Stun for 3 sec. Additionally, for 20 sec, ATK is increased by 52244 and Dodge Rate is increased by 250 , while gaining immunity to CC. This status cannot be dispelled.

skill.name: Goddess Strike
skill.description: Increases own All DEF by 9737 , and Dodge Chance by 200. A successful dodge increases DMG of normal attacks by 50% for 5 sec.

name: Kaulah
description: This great Orc shaman wields the power of lightning. He is the chieftain of the Skywind Tribe and a respected elder of the Orc Alliance. He has trained countless Orc shamans and is considered their spiritual leader. He is also one of the few shamans who has clairvoyant dreams, and he is wise enough to properly interpret them.

skill.name: Thunderbolt
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 5 times, dealing 284155 M.DMG each hit and inflicting Electric Shock. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, inflicts Stun for 3 sec.

skill.name: Healing Rain
skill.description: Heals 734550 HP of all allies over 5 times. For the duration of Skill, Kaulah gains immunity to CC and takes 50% reduced All DMG.

skill.name: Swift Wind
skill.description: For 15 sec, increases all allies' ATK by 40844, ATK Spd by 350, and Crit Chance by 350.

skill.name: Chain Lightning
skill.description: Deals 66669 M.DMG to 4 enemies every 15 sec, inflicts Electric Shock for 20 sec, and stuns them for 1 sec upon a Critical Hit. Enemies under Electric Shock take a total of 116080 M.DMG over 20 sec. For every enemy under Electric Shock, Kaulah takes 15% reduced DMG. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremovable.

name: Kibera
description: Kibera is a cheerful wielder of demonic swords who hails from the East. Other than the fact that he's from the East, the only other thing known about Kibera is that he likes cheap food despite his noble and dashing appearance, he's a skilled swordsman, and that he is abnormally obsessed with demonic swords. Anyone with common sense would stay away from demonic swords as they are afraid of the curse and tragedies the 'evil power within these swords could bring upon.
