However, unphased by this so-called evil power, Kibera rather casually picks up these cursed demonic swords with no hesitation. Whenever Kibera comes across a fine demonic sword, his eyes blaze with desire as if he's declaring that he will seize the sword no matter what, This abnormal possession of trying to acquire a sword, even risking his very own life with no regard to gains or loss, has made people avoid him altogether because it feels like he's a possessed spirit of a sword.

skill.name: Mm, You Better Pay Attention!
skill.description: Attacks an enemy 11 times, dealing a total of 143787 M.DMG. Afterward, summons a [Dark Whirlpool] for 4 sec that attack the target and nearby enemies 8 times, dealing a total of 166384 M.DMG. If Nocturnal Demonic Sword, [Night Sky] is selected, DMG of self's normal attacks increases by 50% and each normal attack reduces Cooldown of this Skill by 0.5 sec.

skill.name: Heh, Let's Have Some Fun!
skill.description: Dispels all negative effects from self and turns into [Show Dominion] state for 5 sec. While in [Shadow Dominion] state, ATK is increased by 75992 and HP does not fall below 10%. After Skill use, [Ha! Full of Openings!] can be used within 5 sec. If Umbral Demonic Sword, [Dark Shadow] is selected, the Mana Cost of this Skill is reduced by 1.

skill.name: Ha! Full of Openings
skill.description: Moves to the back of the enemy with the highest ATK, marking the target with [Dark Corrosion] and reducing the ATK Spd of the marked target by 400 for 10 sec. Kibera's attacks will prioritize the marked target. If [Umbral Demonic Sword, Dark Shadow] is selected, enemies inflicted with [Dark Corrosion] cannot receive positive effects, and have their Mana reduced by 250 every 1 sec.

skill.name: Say Hello to Death!!
skill.description: Sticks [Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] into the ground, creating a shockwave that deals 332027 M.DMG to nearby enemies in a circular range of self and inflicts Stun for 5 sec. Afterward, for 10 sec, unloads [Dark Thunder] to a random enemy every 2 sec, dealing 58827 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 0.5 sec. If Darkslayer Demonic Sword, [Veil] is selected, the Mana Cost of all Skills increases by 1, but DMG inflicted by this Skill will ignore DEF and the Heal Rate of enemies hit by [Dark Thunder] will be reduced by 50% for 5 sec.

skill.name: Three Demonic Swords
skill.description: At the beginning of the first Battle, Kibera can select a demonic sword. He gains immunity to CC until he selects his sword, but he cannot recover mana during that period. Once he selects a sword, his stats and the effect of a skill will be enhanced depending on the selected sword. Nocturnal Demonic Sword, [Night Sky] - Increases ATK Spd by 300 and enhances the effect of [Mm, You Better Pay Attention]. Umbral Demonic Blade, [Dark Shadow] - Increases DEF by 18992 and enhances the effect of [Heh, Let's Have Some Fun!] and [Ha! Full of Openings]. Darkslayer Demonic Sword, [Veil] - Increases ATK by 28496 and enhances the effect of [Say Hello to Death!!].

name: Kirze
description: Few years ago, small towns all over Orbis were attacked by the undead army of Malduk. They were seeking out albino kids, ones who were born with unique and powerful magic. Malduk's subordinates captured these children, and injected them with crimson arcane crystals, a powerful energy source for Demons. The goal of this experiment was to transform them into crimson arcane crystal living mines - that would mass produce crimson arcane crystals until the moment they die. Pain from the inhumane experiment took its toll on the children and one by one, losing their lives. Children who weren't compatible with the crimson arcane crystal were petrified and crumbled into dust. The remaining children who witnessed this horror were shaking with fear, and hopelessly awaited their death. But the experiment finally came to a success. Crimson arcane crystals resonated with Kirze, and she absorbed all the crystals in the area. As a result, she gained vast amount of mana and gained ability to manipulate crimson arcane crystals at her will. With her new found power, Kirze defeated Malduk's subordinates and fled from the lab with the surviving children. In the hopes of preventing further casualties like herself, Kirze took off and began to hunt rouge demons that crossed her path...

skill.name: Slash, Blade of Judgment!
skill.description: Deals a total of 127673 M.DMG over 7 attacks to nearby enemies in a circular range of self. Then, attacks frontal enemies in range, dealing 189305 M.DMG and knocking them down for 3 sec.

skill.name: Disperse, Crystal Haze!
skill.description: Unleashes the power of Arcane Crystals within to deal 93166 M.DMG to all enemies and stun them for 2 sec. Upon casting, activates [Arcane Crystal Awakening] for 15 sec, which increases ATK Spd of all allies by 300 and releases a shockwave every 2 sec to enemies in range of self, dealing 102251 M.DMG and stunning them for 1 sec.

skill.name: Bloom, Crimson Flower!
skill.description: Summons Arcane Crystals and deals 172779 M.DMG to frontal enemies in a straight line. Shortly afterward, causes an explosion that deals 276243 additional M.DMG and inflicts [Arcane Crystal Curse] upon enemies for 5 sec, reducing their ATK Spd by 200. Attacking enemies under [Arcane Crystal Curse] inflicts a stack of [Arcane Crystal Energy]. [Arcane Crystal Curse] explodes after 5 sec, dealing M.DMG equal to 113842 + 9669 per stack of [Arcane Crystal Energy].

skill.name: End to Evil Deeds!
skill.description: Increases own ATK by 75992 and Crit Chance by 200, while increasing the duration of CCs that all allies inflict to Bosses by 30%.

name: Laias
description: This beautiful and gentle priestess of water is actually a morphed blue dragon. In the distant past, she was worshipped by certain desert tribes. However, she has been sleeping for ages for some unknown reason. She can command water to turn lands fertile, and she always used her powers to help her people. In return, the humans built the golden Shrine of Flow in her honor under the lake in the oasis. A flow of evil energy in the desert has awakened her from her sleep, and she has once again begun using her powers to help those around her.

skill.name: Healing Droplets
skill.description: Heals HP of all allies by 275339 and reduces M.DMG they take by 15% for 5 sec. If the target's HP is below 50%, Heal Rate and the amount of reduced M.DMG the target takes increases by x 1.5.

skill.name: Bubble Shield
skill.description: For 15 sec, casts a shield that blocks 989666 DMG on the ally with the lowest HP. While the shield is in effect, it grants Immunity to CC, increases the ATK by 35622 , and heals 39592 HP every sec for the ally.

skill.name: Festival of the Flow
skill.description: Deals 236352 M.DMG to nearby enemies and knocks them down. All allies, excluding self, recovers 2 orbs of mana. Afterwards, for 12 sec, creates a whirlpool that deals 157578 M.DMG to random enemies and knocks them down for 2 sec.

skill.name: Blessing of the Water Dragon
skill.description: All allies' M.DEF is increased by 4748 , and M.Crit Hit Resistance is increased by 250.

name: Lakrak
description: This eccentric albino Goblin enjoys developing powerful weapons more than anything else. Having been harassed and ostracized by other Goblins due to his skin color, he feels no compassion toward his kind. He would gladly shoot, blow up, and smash even a fellow Goblin to test his weapons. However, he also expresses his gratitude to those who help him, and this is how he became Roi's friend. Unfortunately, he is terrible at remembering faces, so he often tries to shoot Roi before he recalls who he is.

skill.name: Rapid Fire
skill.description: Attacks all frontal enemies in a straight line, dealing 265827 P.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec. If the target is not a Hero, deals 127628 additional P.DMG. [Experiment Success!] Removes Cooldown.

skill.name: Smoke Bomb
skill.description: Deals 159466 P.DMG to target and nearby enemies within range and inflicts them with [Explosive Material] for 10 sec, causing them to take 20% increased P.DMG and additionally inflicting Blind for 4 sec. [Experiment Success!] Dispels positive effects from enemies within range.

skill.name: Glue Bomb
skill.description: Attaches a Glue Bomb to a random enemy that explodes in 3 sec to a random enemy, dealing 548169 P.DMG to the target and nearby enemies and inflicting Stun for 3 sec. If the target is inflicted with [Explosive Material], deals 359082 additional P.DMG. [Experiment Success!] Glue Bomb explodes immediately after attachment.

skill.name: Load Cannon
skill.description: Normal attacks have a 15% chance of firing a bomb that deals 124195 P.DMG to enemies within range and inflicting Stun for 2 sec. After each Skill use, Lakrak conducts and experiment. The experiment has a 50% success rate. Upon success, enhances the effects of the next skill use. Experiment does not occur when Lakrak uses the enhanced Skill.

name: Laudia
description: Trovatias are a nomadic tribe of Aegina Desert who inherited the tradition and religion of the ancient desert kingdom. Laudia is the daughter of the tribe leader and serves the Priestess of Water, Laias. She also looks after the tribe on behalf of her old father. When she prayed for help, God Dragon Laias and her sister Lilia woke up from their long sleep and led her and her tribe into the shrine, protecting them. Ever since, Laudia has been defeating demons in the desert with Zafir, the leader of the Mauhata tribe of Desert Warriors.

skill.name: Whisper of Sand
skill.description: Attacks target enemy and deals 95775 M.DMG to enemies in close range, decreasing enemy block chance by 500 and Crit resistance by 500 for 8 sec. Additionally, attacks and deals 124518 M.DMG and stuns them for 3 sec.

skill.name: Enchanting Flow
skill.description: Increases own ATK by 28496 and Crit DMG by 70% for 10 sec. Then moves a short distance forward, dealing 898838 M.DMG to enemies in movement range and Charms them for 5 sec if the skill was used in the Arena. Can activate [Alluring Ambush] once within 5 sec after use.

skill.name: Alluring Ambush
skill.description: Attacks target enemy 3 times, dealing a total of 282705 M.DMG. Deals extra 133038 M.DMG ignoring the target's DEF to Boss enemies and enemies inflicted by Charm.

skill.name: Dance of the Desert
skill.description: Attacks enemies in range 30 times, dealing a total of 634410 M.DMG. Additionally throws the 'Blades of Arlaq' at random enemies 30 times, dealing a total of 427500 M.DMG. Extra 1900 DMG is stacked every time the blade hits the same enemy. [Blinding Acceleration] can be used once during skill activation, and the 'Blades of Arlaq' prioritize targets inflicted by Charm.

skill.name: Blinding Acceleration
skill.description: Gains immunity to CC for 3 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 800.

skill.name: Blessing of Oasis
skill.description: Decreases CC duration inflicted on self by 30%. Upon using a skill, gains [Blessing of Oasis] for 20 sec, increasing own Penetration by 30 and DEF by 1896. [Blessing of Oasis] can be stacked up to max 10 times and cannot be dispelled.

name: Lavril
description: A very unconventional ghost. Those who see her may think of her as a ghost of an ordinary girl, but she's not a single spectral entity. Rather, she's an amalgamation of countless souls. Filled with tremendous spectral energy, she is powerful enough to make souls tremble and cast curses at her will....That is, if she was an ordinary ghost. Although she's a ghost born from an amalgamation of young souls that died in the Demon War 100 years ago, the souls of children are too pure and innocent to bear any grudge. Lavril, having been born from them, came into being with a pure and kind mind. Nonetheless, she's still a ghost. Her nature won't change. Even though she's currently a kind and poor girl, a child is like a piece of blank paper, in which a single drop of ink can easily change its color. Without any proper guidance, she can be a threat.

skill.name: G-go Away!
skill.description: Deals 196114 M.DMG to the enemy and reduces its Crit Resistance by 300 for 10 sec. Hit enemies become affected by Lavril's Ectoplasm for 5 sec, taking 34728 M.DMG every 0.5 sec. Every time an enemy takes DMG from this skill, HP of all allies is healed by 5% of the DMG dealt.

skill.name: Bear Up...!
skill.description: Heals the HP of an ally with the highest ATK by 318500 and heals additional 34194 HP every 1 sec for 15 sec. Increases Crit DMG of the ally by 50% + 15% of Lavril's Crit DMG for 15 sec. [You Scare Me...!] becomes available for 5 sec after casting this skill.

skill.name: You Scare Me...!
skill.description: Deals 296540 M.DMG to the enemy and reduces its ATK Spd by 250 for 15 sec while increasing M.DMG it takes by 25%.

skill.name: Leave Me Alone...!
skill.description: Swirls a Spectral Tornado in a wide range to the front, dealing 73723 M.DMG every 0.5 sec for 5 sec. Each hit reduces ATK of hit enemies by 3% for 5 sec, and increases M.DMG they take by 3%. This effect can be stacked up to max 15 times.

skill.name: Together Forever...
skill.description: At the beginning of the first battle, forms a Soul Link with an ally with the highest ATK. This effect cannot be dispelled. The ally bound by Soul Link has their ATK increased by 32055 and recovers 100 Mana every second.

name: Leo
description: In the royal palace of Orvel, there exists a library that is said to be infinite in space. Leo is a Gnome who has been protecting this library for a very long time. Having memorized every book in the library, he is the most knowledgeable person in the entire palace, and many visit the library, seeking his wisdom. However, he still seems to have difficulty interacting with others.

skill.name: Rune of Frailty
skill.description: Engraves a rune on the target, dealing up to 203012 P.DMG that ignores DEF based on missing HP and reducing their P.DEF by 50% for 8 sec.

skill.name: Rune of Healing
skill.description: Heals 236468 HP of all allies.

skill.name: Rune of Silence
skill.description: Deals 88006 P.DMG to all enemies, and dispels all positive effects. Inflicts Silences on target for 3 sec.

skill.name: Rune of Protection
skill.description: Every 10 sec, engraves a rune upon the ally with the lowest HP and recovers a total of 312440 HP for 10 sec.

name: Lewisia
description: A Vampire princess who joined Kyle in his war against the Demons 100 years ago. She is a pure-blood Vampire who has lived for over 500 years. Often considered the Queen of Vampires, she is nigh immortal. The tremendous expenditure of her power during the war against the Demons has taken its toll, and the immortal princess now assumes a child-like form. After the war, she blended into Human society and watched the world change over the next 100 years while slowly restoring her power. When the Demons reappeared and the Holy Sword awoke, Lewisia sensed the sudden shifts of energy. Soon after, she left on a journey to find and observe the newly chosen warrior.

skill.name: Blood Orb
skill.description: Deals 293762 M.DMG to target, increasing M.DMG the target takes 25% for 10 sec. Each stacks of Blood Curse, inflicted upon target increases DMG dealt by 1%. Upon use, consumes 10% of current HP.

skill.name: Blood Zone
skill.description: Deals 352394 M.DMG to the target and creates a Blood Zone that lasts for 10 sec around the target. Enemies within the Blood Zone take 25205 M.DMG every 0.5 sec, and have their M.DEF is reduced by 30%. Each stack of Blood Curse inflicted upon target increases DMG dealt by 1%. Upon use, consumes 20% of current HP.

skill.name: Blood Banquet
skill.description: Attacks frontal enemies in a straight line 3 times, dealing a total of 308775 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec. Each stack of Blood Curse inflicted upon target increases DMG dealt by 1% Upon use, consumes 10% of current HP.

skill.name: Blood Dominator
skill.description: When HP is 50% or above, ATK is increased by 35148 and DEF Penetration  by 250. Upon attack, inflicts target with Blood Curse, dealing a total of 12900 continuous M.DMG over time for 20 sec and recovering HP equal to 10% of DMG dealt by Blood Curse. Blood Curse can be stacked up to max 60 times, and it is irremovable.

name: Lilia
description: A God Dragon of the Oasis and a sister of the Priestess of Water. Laias. She is still a young Blue Dragon who loves her sister who is much older than her. When Laias fell into a deep sleep after exhausting her powers in the battle 100 years ago, Lilia defended the Shrine of Flow on her own. It was when she heard the children of the desert making desperate prayers that she finally woke up the Priestess of Water to protect them. Unlike her mild and thoughtful sister, she is somewhat strict, and the way she controls the power of flow and water is more aggressive, too. She feels the need to protect her beautiful sister against flirting, unworthy men.

skill.name: Aqua Tempest
skill.description: For 8 sec, summons Aqua Tempest to a random target and enemies in target's range and deals 19217 P.DMG every 0.5 sec. If the target is killed, Aqua Tempest is summoned to attack another random target for the remaining time.

skill.name: Everlasting Oasis
skill.description: When activated, turns into the Everlasting Oasis state for 15 sec. During the Everlasting Oasis state, mana recovery rate per sec is increased by 150% and ATK is increased by 79077. Additionally, all DEF is increased by 9737.

skill.name: Celestial Cataract
skill.description: Throws water drops 15 times to random enemies, dealing a total of 343290 P.DMG. Additionally, throws big water drops 5 times to target and other enemies in target's range, dealing 559125 P.DMG. Enemies hit by the big water drop are inflicted by Stun for 2 sec. Per each water drop thrown, 25 mana is consumed, and mana consumption rate is increased by 13. Stops use when mana becomes 0.

skill.name: Aqua Purification
skill.description: Mana Recovery upon attack is fixed, but increaeses own ATK by 41559, Crit Chance by 300, and Mana Recovery per sec to 120. Per 6 Mana Recovery per sec, ATK is increased by 1%.

name: Loman
description: If one were to choose the most trustworthy among the Guardian Knights, Loman's name would be one of the first to come to mind. The royal family trusts him so much that they appointed Loman as the Gatekeeper of the Orvel Monarchy. He is usually a gentle and friendly man, but becomes uncompromising when anyone tries to approach his king without royal permission. No one who has seen his halberd, the one bestowed by Scarlet, split the air has ever returned alive. While off duty, however, he is a sensitive man who enjoys wood carving as a hobby.

skill.name: Cut Ground
skill.description: Deals 138175 P.DMG to frontal enemies within range and knocks them down for 4 sec, increasing P.Weakness of the affected targets by 25% for 10 sec.

skill.name: Shrouding Creed
skill.description: Removes negative effects from all allies. Casts a shield upon all allies that absorbs 354966 DMG for 5 second(s) and reduces all DMG to allies by 20% for 10 second(s). The shield grants immunity to CC while it lasts.

skill.name: Knight's Creed
skill.description: Hits frontal enemies within range 3 times. First 2 hits deal 115539 P.DMG and stun enemies for 1.5 second(s) while the last hit attacks enemies in wider range 2 times, dealing 273022 P.DMG in total. The last hit stuns enemies for 5 seconds and leaves [Mark of Creed] on the enemies, damaging them for 15 second(s). Targets with [Mark of Creed] take additional 107504 P.DMG from allies excluding caster. Additional DMG effect is activated only once every 0.5 second(s).

skill.name: The Last Gatekeeper
skill.description: Stacks [Endurance] every second. [Endurance] cannot be dispelled, and when stacked 20 times, deals 7900 P.DMG, ignoring DEF on nearby enemies and reduces ATK of affected enemies by 20% for 10 second(s). A successful block grants 1 additional [Endurance] stack. This effect is activated only once every 0.2 second(s).

name: Lorraine
description: The Great Sage of Elidora is the wisest of the Druids. As one of the heroes who fought against the Demon invaders 100 years ago, she is often considered the wisest person on the entire Orbis Continent. She has taught and trained countless Elves, and possesses keen insight and mystic powers befitting her age. It is said that even the current king of Elidora as well as his children were all once her students. Having recently sensed a strange disturbance from the Elidora Forest, she is preparing the path for the wielder of the Holy Sword.

skill.name: Thornbush Forest
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy and its nearby enemies 3 times, dealing a total of 372021 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec.

skill.name: Seed of Belladonna
skill.description: Creates a Seed of Belladonna around the target for 10 sec. The seed deals 138584 M.DMG to nearby enemies every 2 sec, increasing M.DMG the target takes by 30% and reducing Heal Rate by 30% for 5 sec.

skill.name: Wrath of the Forest
skill.description: Attacks enemies within a wide frontal range of self 6 times, dealign a total of 630588 M.DMG and knocking them down for 3 sec.

skill.name: Poison
skill.description: Normal and Skill attacks inflict Poison on a target, dealing a total of 410580 continuous M.DMG and reducing Heal Rate by 5% over 20 sec. Poison can be stacked up to max 5 times.

name: Lucias
description: Lucias was a member of Lua's Holy Knights before awakening as the Saint of Blessings. Under the command of the Living Legend, Ricardo, he protected Orvel and neighboring towns from Demons. However, stigmata started to appear on his body when he was 19, and by the call of Lua, the holy knight became the Saint of Blessings. His mission is to travel around the world and bring the light of Lua to those in need. He stayed true to his duties, wandering the world to share blessings. Now, he holds a weapon in his hand again to defeat the power of darkness that has been growing in strength over the past 100 years.

skill.name: Path of Blessings
skill.description: Heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by 350151 and targets take 20% reduced P.DMG for 7 sec.

skill.name: Zone of Faith
skill.description: Sets up the [Zone of Faith] at the own location for 6 sec. Increases ATK of allies in [Zone of Faith] by 64833 and dispels negative effects on them continuously. Heals allies in area by 61303 every second. Deals P.DMG of 102501 on enemies within [Zone of Faith] every second, and stuns them for 0.7 sec.

skill.name: Stigmata
skill.description: Increases P.Dodge of all allies by 250 and their ATK by 36803 for 15 sec. Effects will be dispelled when the self dies. Normal attacks deal additional P.DMG of 208424 to targets for 15 sec, and increases the P.DMG taken by target by 25% for 5 sec.

skill.name: Holy Sacrifice
skill.description: Casting Path of Blessings and Zone of Faith consumes 20% of self's current HP. Upon healing an ally with these spells, the amount of healing is increased by 48947 and the target gains 4507 additional DEF for 10 sec.

name: Lucikiel
description: One of the Five Primal Demons whom Lea bestowed her power upon. Bestowed with the pwoer of 'Destruction,' Lucikiel is gifted with powerful strength, even among the Primal Demons. The 'Power of Destruction,' however, gives much more than just supremacy in battle strength. Its reach is not limited to only object that can be seen or touched. It can even affect the worlds themselves, and one of its usages is temporarily 'destroying' the rift between the Pandemonium and the Material World to travel between the worlds. Using this, Lucikiel has been traveling between the two worlds even before the Demons invaded the Material World, observing the world that he will destroy one day. During all these times, nothing really piqued Lucikiel's interest in the Material World - until certain individuals attracted his attention. How these individuals will affect Lucikiel's course of action is yet to unfold.

skill.name: Death Storm
skill.description: Attack the target and nerby 3 times, dealing a total of 650775 M.DMG and leaving a [Shadow of Death]. [Shadow of Death] deals 193560 M.DMG and reduces the target's Heal Rate by 30% over 10 sec.

skill.name: Annihilation Wave
skill.description: Attacks frontal enemies within range 2 times. The first attack deals 189270 M.DMG and inflicts Stun for 3 sec. The second attack deals 309262 M.DMG and draws in hit targets in front of self. Affter use, the Skill changes to [Annihilation Surge].

skill.name: Annihilation Surge
skill.description: Attacks frontal enemies within a wide range 2 times. The first attack deals 277968 M.DMG and inflicts Stun for 5 sec. The second attack deals 369464 M.DMG and draws in hit targets in front of self. Affter use, the Skill changes to [Annihilation Wave].

skill.name: Doomsday
skill.description: Attacks nearby enemies 9 times, dealing a total of 518562 M.DMG, and draws them in front of self. The last hit deals 384128 M.DMG, knocks down hit targets for 5 sec, and leaves [Pain of Doom] that lasts for 10 sec. Each time Lucikiel attacks targets inflicted with [Pain of Doom] with a normal or Skill attack, he deals 49374 additional M.DMG.

skill.name: Armor of the Demon God
skill.description: Reduces All DMG taken by 25% and the duration of CC by 50%. Upon every Skill use, creates [Authority of the Demon God] that absorbs 197926 DMG for 6 sec. Gains immunity to CC for the duration of [Authority of the Demon God].

name: Luna
description: Lulus, very rarely sighted and often considered mythical, are a race of animal hybrids. They live in an extremely cold region, and are very fearful of contacting the outside world. One day, a Lulu child was born with the exact opposite personality that is typical her race. That child is Luna. It's not that she was unhappy with the ways of her people. Nor did she have any grand purpose of experiencing the world outside. She was simply picking flowers, one step at a time. Another step to pick up some frozen branches for her slingshot. And another step to follow the scent of some sweet, red fruit. Before she knew it, she was outside, running toward a carrot field away from the mountain.

skill.name: Pew!
skill.description: Deals 163643 M.DMG by shooting a bouncing projectile which bounces 3 times starting from the nearest enemy. The further the enemy, the more DMG inflicted.

skill.name: Look out above!
skill.description: Deals 284915 M.DMG to enemies furthest away in a small range, and stuns them for 3 sec. The further the enemy, the more DMG they will take.

skill.name: Twinkle Twinkle
skill.description: Deals 118336 M.DMG to target enemies in range, and reduces target's Crit Chance by 100% for 7 sec.

skill.name: Gotcha!
skill.description: When inflicted by CC, dispels negative effects from self and attacks the farthest enemy, dealing 38284 M.DMG and knocking it away for 2 sec. Affterward, recovers 1 orb of Mana.

name: Maria
description: Although she was a Holy Maiden of Lua in the past, she eventually fell into corruption. Now, this cynical, crow-commanding witch curses her former Goddess from the darkness. There was a time when she was a friend of Kyle and a heroine of the people. However, when Kyle disappeared, she hid herself from the world as well. She eventually came back as a fallen witch, threatening mankind as the spearhead of the Demon Army. These days, however, she appears to be plotting some scheme, not as a Demon commander, but completely on her own.

skill.name: Raven Storm
skill.description: Deals a total of 481491 M.DMG over 3 times to enemies in frontal range and knocks them back, reducing hit enemies' ATK Spd by 250 and M.DEF by 30% for 15 sec. If the target is not a Hero, each hit deals 160497 additional M.DMG.

skill.name: Claw of Restriction
skill.description: Deals 218709 M.DMG to 2 enemies and shackles them for 6 sec. Hit targets take 63348 continuous M.DMG over 6 sec and take 30% increased M.DMG for the duration of Skill.

skill.name: Area of Darkness
skill.description: Draws in nearby enemies towards the center 5 times and deals a total of 607795 M.DMG. The last attack stuns enemies for 3 sec. Deals additional 121559 M.DMG to Non-Hero enemies.

skill.name: Black Wind
skill.description: Increases Crit Chance by 150 and each hit inflicts [Curse of Lea] on the target for 10 sec. Targets inflictes with [Curse of Lea] have theirCrit Chance reduced by 250 and ATK by 25% for the duration of Skill.

name: May
description: A girl who runs her own General Shop at the Orvel Castle. She is highly likable, and treats everyone with brightness and enthusiasm. Dreaming of one day she'll become the wealthiest merchant in Orvel, May usually hunts and gathers her own merchandise. Because of the effort she puts into acquiring her goods, her prices aren't exactly cheap, and people often criticize her for this. Currently, she is preparing to travel to Aegina Desert after hearing that someone recently discovered a treasure there.

skill.name: Take anything!
skill.description: All allies' ATK is increased by 5222 for 120 sec, and randomly grants one of the following effects: 1. DEF Penetration 70 up, 2. Atk Spd 100 up, 3. Instant Mana recovery by 500. All effects other than Mana Recovery can be stacked up to 5 times max.

skill.name: Cheer up!
skill.description: All allies' HP is healed by 330736 , and per each sec, each ally recovers 1% of their max HP for 10 sec. There is a 10% chance the heal rate doubles.

skill.name: Not for sale!
skill.description: Attacks a random target and other enemies in range 3 times, dealing a total of 465795 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 4 sec. There is a 10% chance that the skill range, DMG, and Stun duration are doubled.

skill.name: Take this!
skill.description: Every 15 sec, deals 154304 M.DMG to 4 random enemies, and randomly inflicts one of the following: 1. 185720 M.DMG over time for 10 sec, 2. Stun for 2 sec, 3. Freeze for 5 sec

name: Mediana
description: A practitioner of the medical arts developed when priests were short in supply. She inherited her natural medical talent from her father, but her thirst for knowledge crossed the line when she began researching poison. As a result, she was excommunicated from medical society, but her enthusiasm for research was seemingly unaffected. However, her basic respect for life kept her from achieving any experimental results for her poison research. When the Demons appeared, she became overjoyed at finding rare and precious test subjects.

skill.name: Healing Salve
skill.description: Heals all allies by 283695 and makes them immune to the next single hit of DMG.

skill.name: Special Water Cannon
skill.description: Fires a water cannon in a frontal direction, healing allies in range of 33943 HP every 0.5 sec, and dealing 50768 P.DMG to the enemy.

skill.name: Strengthening Potion
skill.description: Injects the ally with the highest ATK with a strengthening potion, increasing their ATK by 20%+ 42740 of Mediana's ATK and keeping their HP from falling below 5%.

skill.name: Mediana's Special Poison
skill.description: Increases all allies' ATK by 5937 and P.Crit Resistance by 200. Upon attack, injects the enemy with a Special Poison that deals a total of 116080 P.DMG over 5 sec and reduces P.Crit Resistance by 200. If there are 2 or more allies including herself, Mediana will be counted as the ally with the highest ATK.

name: Mirianne
description: She is Sonia's maid and sister-like friend from the orphanage. When her village of Humans and Elves was attacked by the Demons, she was the only survivor. Ricardo found her and took her into his orphanage. For some unknown reason, she experienced explosive growth phase at the age of 6. Her body now resembles that of an 18-year-old, but she still has the mind of a child. She is pure and devotional to a fault. Perhaps these traits are related to the loss of her childhood memories.

skill.name: Target Lock On
skill.description: Attacks the enemy with the lowest M.DEF 3 times, dealing a total of 21489 M.DMG and inflicting stun for 1 sec, and if the target is under 'Target Lock On', target takes additional 89961 M.DMG. The last attack inflicts 'Target Lock On' on the enemy for 10 sec. Lock On cannot be dispelled, and the target's M.Block rate has decreased by 500.

skill.name: Restrain and Protect
skill.description: Deals 223314 M.DMG to target enemy and other enemies in range, and Stuns them for 2 sec. Then moves to an ally with the lowest P.DEF, excluding self, and creates Shield for two that can block 188684 DMG for 10 sec. Shield will be ineffective when there is no ally. Gains immunity to CC while the Shield lasts.

skill.name: Assassination
skill.description: Moves to an enemy with the lowest HP, deals 356664 M.DMG then returns to the furthest ally. If the enemy is not a hero, deals 534872 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF. Defeating a target with this skill instantly triggers 'Restrain and Protect'.

skill.name: Target Eliminated
skill.description: If an enemy is inflicted by 'Target Lock On', ATK increases by 89055 and all attacks skills prioritize Locked On enemies. When the Locked On enemies dies, 'Target Lock On' is inflicted on another enemy for 10 sec.

name: Miruru
description: She once roamed the seas as the pirate empress, instilling fear in sailors' hearts. However, a cursed item has turned her into a child, and all her loyal allies and crew members soon left her. Not one to give up, she started again from the scratch, and now dreams of returning to her former glory. Unfortunately, the curse of childhood has made her way of thinking immature as well. Even so, she continues to chase her dream. Currently, she commands the second Miruru Pirates consisting of Goblins and Gnolls.

skill.name: Baaaam!
skill.description: Deals 298774 P.DMG to all enemies and pushes them back.

skill.name: Roll Over
skill.description: Deals 86817 P.DMG 3 times to frontal enemies, and each attack has a 100% chance of knocking them down for 2 sec.

skill.name: Miruru Pirates!
skill.description: Attacks a random target and the enemies near it 5 times, dealing a total of 455420 P.DMG and reducing their ATK Spd by 400. If the target is not a Hero, deals 110806 additional P.DMG.

skill.name: Boooooom!
skill.description: When dealing a normal attack, shoots additional bullet with a 60% chance of dealing 42039 P.DMG to all enemies.

name: Mitra
description: Known to some as the Song of the Silver Madness, he is incredibly insincere in everything he does. He shows absolutely no sense of responsibility in regard to those around him. Once he engages in a combat, though, he turns into an untouchable silver wolf that storms across the battlefield. Nothing is known about his past. One thing is certain: he does not distinguish between friend and foe once the madness of battle takes over him. Staying near him when he's in this state may be far more dangerous than holding onto a ticking time bomb.

skill.name: Bang! Bang!!
skill.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times, dealing 100816 P.DMG each. Upon Crit Hit, an explosion occurs, dealing 49221 extra P.DMG to enemies in range.

skill.name: Time to Die!!
skill.description: For 20 sec, ATK is increased by 63877 , and ACC is increased by 300. Each auto attack has a 15% chance of activating 'Bang! Bang!!'.

skill.name: Dance with me!!
skill.description: Rapidly shoots a random enemy 12 times, dealing a total of 641388 P.DMG, and additional 381 P.DMG per Mark of Death stack. Each hit with this Skill inflicts an irremovable stack of Mark of Death on the enemy.

skill.name: You're Next!!
skill.description: Normal attacks inflict an irremovable stack of Mark of Death on the enemy. Whenever a normal attack or Bang! Bang! hits the target, deals 13732 additional P.DMG. Each stack of Mark of Death deals 203 additional P.DMG. Mark of Death can be stacked up to max 200 times.

name: Morrah
description: The former commander of the Dark Dragon Knights, she's the most gallant demon knight of the Demon Army. Currently, for some unknown reason, she is following the witch Maria and assisting her work. Many find it strange that the former champion of the Demon Army, who slaughtered countless enemies and even devoured dragons, now works for a mere witch as her servant. Nevertheless, she continues to faithfully serve her master.

skill.name: Burning Power
skill.description: Deals 65655 M.DMG to enemies in range and knocks them down, inflicting 3 stacks of Flame. Then for 15 sec, each auto attack deals 13239 M.DMG and inflicts 1 stack of Flame on enemy. Per each stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%. Each Flame stack deals separate M.DMG and reduces Heal rate by 1%.

skill.name: Hellfire
skill.description: For 20 sec, all allies' M.DEF is increased by 7833 and M.Block Chance is increased by 250. Additionally, every 1 sec, inflicts 1 stack of Flame on nearby enemies.

skill.name: Lava Eruption
skill.description: Deals 296427 M.DMG to enemies in range and inflict knock down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%.

skill.name: Fire Smash
skill.description: Upon Block, deals 40133 M.DMG to enemies in range, and inflicts 3 stack of Flame.

name: Naila
description: A stout and honorable warrior of the Harpies, the wielders of the power of wind. Her dignity as a Harpy warrior is more important to her than anything else in the world. She draws upon her willpower and desire to uphold her warrior's honor to bring down any enemy. Her skills are exceptional, even among her peers, and she is the ideal role model for younger Harpy warriors.

skill.name: Fierce Winds
skill.description: Naila dashes toward the enemy 2 times. For her first attack, she moves behind the target, dealing 338643 P.DMG and knocking it down for 3 sec. For her second attack, she moves behind the enemy with the highest ATK, dealing 223436 P.DMG, knocking it down for 3 sec, and increasing the P.DMG it takes by 25% for 10 sec.

skill.name: Wind Reading
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from self, and casts [Wind Reading] to all allies for 20 sec, increasing their ATK by 66014 and P.Dodge by 250. If an ally under [Wind Reading] successfully dodges an attack, their Crit DMG increases by 5% for 10 sec. The Crit DMG Boost effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.

skill.name: Dive Bomb
skill.description: Attacks nearby enemies in a circular range of self, dealing 433347 P.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec. 500 DEF Penetration applies to this Skill.

skill.name: Tornado Strike
skill.description: Increases Naila's DEF Penetration by 150 and DEF by 15433. Naila's normal attacks and Skill attacks ignore target's DMG Reduction effect. Also, her normal attacks have a 15% chance to deal 179843 additional P.DMG and inflict Stun for 1 sec.

name: Neraxis
description: Black dragons are notorious for being the most arrogant and ill-tempered out of all dragons. They suffered greatly from the Demon War 100 years ago. Armarta went mad, Ashen Nox robbed them, and Draconics started hunting down dragons. Neraxis was one of the few black dragon that survived that day, and he has been working and plotting to realize his revenge.

skill.name: Black Lightning Claw
skill.description: Draws enemies towards the target and deals 96559 M.DMG. Deals 138175 M.DMG around the target after 1 sec and stuns them for 3 sec. Reduces ATK Spd of hit enemies by 300 for 10 sec.

skill.name: Obsidian Roar
skill.description: Increases ATK, P.DEF, and M.DEF of all allies by 15192 for 15 sec. Deals 207384 M.DMG to all enemies and reduces their ATK by 30% for 15 sec.

skill.name: Breath of Destruction
skill.description: Deals a total of 325818 M.DMG to enemies within a large area around the target over 6 times and reduces their M.DEF by 20% for 15 sec. Each hit stuns the enemy for 1 sec.

skill.name: Black Dragon Hide
skill.description: Increases P.DEF and M.DEF by 21370 and takes reduced P.DMG and M.DMG by 15%.

name: Nia
description: An old legend has it that there was a demon that used humans as its test subjects for body modification. He cloned, fused, and modified numerous beast and human bodies with his magic. It was said that one of the test subjects that came to possess great power escaped the laboratory and created a tribe among humans. The leader of the tribe is known to have developed a mysterious ability called Demonic Eyes of Petrification. The demonic eyes, very similar to the cursed eyes of a rare beast Basilisk, are known to have the curse to turn everything they stared at into stones. Nia, the young leader of Krakashu Tribe, currently possesses these demonic eyes. This young beast, as swift as a leopard, is hunting down demons and demonic beasts to avenge her forefathers.

skill.name: Scar of Barbarism
skill.description: Deals 62283 P.DMG to 1 enemy. Then, moves forward while continuously attacking the nearby area and knocking back hit enemies to deal a total of 166088 P.DMG. The last strike deals 169482 P.DMG to frontal enemies and knocks them down for 2 sec.

skill.name: Enhanced Scar of Barbarism
skill.description: Deals 125268 P.DMG to 1 enemy. Then, moves to random enemies while continuously attacking the nearby area and knocking back hit enemies to deal a total of 1336192 P.DMG. The last strike deals 336814 P.DMG to frontal enemies and knocks them down for 4 sec.

skill.name: On the Hunt
skill.description: Moves behind the farthest enemy to deal 82621 P.DMG, and inflicts [Hunt Mark] to all enemies for 12 sec. Enemies under [Hunt Mark] take 20% increased P.DMG and have their Heal Rate reduced by 25%. Dispels all positive effects from enemies with [Enhanced Hunt Mark].

skill.name: Enhanced On the Hunt
skill.description: Moves behind the farthest enemy to deal 332076 P.DMG that ignores DEF, and inflicts [Enhanced Hunt Mark] to all enemies for 12 sec. Enemies under [Enhanced Hunt Mark] take 40% increased P.DMG, have their Heal Rate reduced by 50%, and their ATK Spd by 25%. Dispels all positive effects from enemies with [Hunt Mark].

skill.name: Demonic Eyes of Petrification
skill.description: Deals 170693 P.DMG to frontal enemies within range 3 times and petrifies them for 3 sec, reducing their All Dodge Chance by 200 for 10 sec.

skill.name: Enhanced Demonic Eyes of Petrification
skill.description: Deals 185055 P.DMG that ignores DEF to enemies in a wide frontal range 3 times and petrifies them for 5 sec, reducing their All Dodge Chance by 200 for 10 sec.

skill.name: Demonic Blood
skill.description: Gains 1 stack of [Demonic Blood] upon using a skill. It can be stacked up to max 4 times, and upon gaining 4 stacks, reset Cooldown of all Skills and [Enhanced Skill] becomes available. Using [Enhanced Skill] removes [Demonic Blood] stacks. Upon gaining each stack of [Demonic Blood], increases own ATK by 9496 and All Dodge chance by 40 for 20 sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 5 times.

name: Nicky
description: Chief Guard who manages the Orvel Stockade. In the past, she was once a warrior at the Orvel Arena, and a rival to Gladi. When Gladi began to spend more time running a shop than conquering the Arena, Nicky lost interest too and found another job. Somewhat skilled in training monsters, she applied to be the Stockade's Chief Guard, which is a dangerous yet well-paid job. While the inmates usually refrain from doing anything out of their fear for her, from time to time, they would lose all sense of reason and cause a scene. With each incident like that, her mace drew blood, leaving the inmates to cower in fear again.

skill.name: Mace of Rehabilitation
skill.description: Deals P.DMG of 203086 to enemy target and nearby enemies within narrow range, and stuns them for 1 sec. Hit enemies are inflicted with Disarmament for 7 sec. Enemies in Disarmament will have their P.Block changed to 0. This effect cannot be removed.

skill.name: Merciless Gale
skill.description: Swings the weapon to attack enemies in a circular range of self 7 times. Each hit deals 59037 P.DMG and stuns for 1.5 sec. If the target is a Hero, reduces P.DEF by 30%, and if the target is not a Hero, causes it to take 30% increased P.DMG for 5 sec.

skill.name: Last Execution
skill.description: Sets in position, focuses, then attacks enemies in a wide frontal range to deal 477170 P.DMG, dispel positive effects, and knock them down for 6 sec. Deals 620257 additional P.DMG to Non-Hero enemies. For this Skill, ACC and CC Accuracy will be increased by 500.

skill.name: Massacre Instinct
skill.description: Increases ATK by 21370 and Crit Chance by 300. When HP falls below 35%, Cruel Madness effect will be activated. For 8 sec, Cruel Madness effect removes all negative effects from self, increases ATK by 142488 and ATK Spd by 500, reduces DMG received by 50%, and grants immunity to CC. This effect only activates once during the battle.

name: Nyx
description: A mysterious dimension-crossing wizard with distinctly recognizable heterochromia. The perpetual smile on his face seems to come from the wisdom of someone who sees through the entire universe. He shows great interest in those with special abilities and enjoys testing them. His space teleportation ability seems to surpass the realm of mortals, and he can even travel across dimensions. It is unsure what his true motivation is, but it seems certain enough that he always intends to help others.

skill.name: Dimension Blade
skill.description: Deals 283417 P.DMG to target enemies and gains 1 stack of Blade per each hit enemy. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks. Blade can be stacked up to max 5 times, and lasts for 20 sec.

skill.name: Dimension Cleaver
skill.description: Dispels all positive effects of target enemy and deals 263732 P.DMG. Hit enemies take 300930 P.DMG for 10 sec, and are knocked down for 3 sec. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.

skill.name: Infinity Blades
skill.description: Deals 582910 P.DMG to frontal enemies in range, and the final attack deals 312095 P.DMG to one enemy, inflicting knockdown for 3 sec. The number of target for the last attack increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.

skill.name: Hidden Blade
skill.description: Each normal attack fires an additional blade that deals 46993 P.DMG, and there is a 10% chance of gaining 1 Blade stack. Increases the number of targets and Nyx's ATK by 10% for each Blade stack.

name: Oddy
description: He was a mechanic of the royal palace of Orvelia in the distant past. However, he was cursed by the mythical creature Redpur and turned into a Redpur himself. Ever since the transformation, he has been living for so long that he forgot his own age. When he was Human, he invented the first portable watch, but no one in Orvelia saw its true value. To give his invention the recognition it deserved, he set out to the empire. On his way, he was cursed by a group of Redpurs who mistook him for a poacher. The curse also affected his watch, giving it a magical power to control the time flow within a living body. Oddy's own time stopped as well.

skill.name: Time Fracture
skill.description: Deals 85958 M.DMG to enemies in a straight line, and inflicts Petrify for 3 sec.

skill.name: Time Fragments
skill.description: Attacks random enemies 6 times, dealing a total of 485202 M.DMG. With 50% chance, 'Time Fragments' cooldown resets and consumes no mana for the next single activation.

skill.name: Time Distortion
skill.description: Deals 357475 M.DMG to all enemies and increases all allies' ATK Spd by 250 for 15 sec. All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by 50%. 'Time Distortion' is not affected by skill cooldown reduction.

skill.name: Clock Magic
skill.description: Upon using the skill, next 2 attacks deal 196653 additional M.DMG with a 30% chance to petrify the target for 3 sec. This effect activates every 1 sec.

name: Ophelia
description: An astrologer traveling with a wandering troupe called 'Stardust.' As a member of the Witch Association, she is supposed to reside in a designated location and read the flow of fate as part of her practice. However, she is currently traveling in search of a man with a particular destiny she met in a dream. She believes that the man from her clairvoyant dream is destined to become the savior of the world. Her current priority is to find the man, and then stay at his side. If asked about her second goal... She blushes and loses all traces of her usual calmness telling about her future with the man of destiny.

skill.name: Card of Death - Carta
skill.description: Attacks enemy target, dealing 479151 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec. Consumes the card in possession to inflict additional effects. Upon using the skill, gains the card of [Death]. [Death] - DMG ignores target's DEF and Stun duration increases by 5 sec. [Love] - Deals a total of 703860 M.DMG over time for 10 sec and reduces heal rate by 100%. [Fortune] - Skill Cooldown does not take effect.

skill.name: Card of Love - Elliciad
skill.description: Increases ATK by 74096 for 12 sec and Mana Recovery/Sec by 100%. Consumes a card in possession to gain an additional effect according to the card type. Gains [Love] card upon use. [Death] - DEF Penetration increases by 600 for the duration of skill and gains immunity to CC for 6 sec. [Love] - The effect applies to all allies. [Luck] - Cooldown does not apply.

skill.name: Card of Fortune - Vellekia
skill.description: Attacks the target and the enemies near it to deal 362810 M.DMG. This attack cannot miss and deals 100% increased Crit DMG. Gains [Luck] card upon use. [Death] - Crit DMG increases by 120%. [Love] - Removes all positive effects from enemies in range and silences them for 2 sec. [Luck] - Cooldown does not apply. Recovers 1 orb of Mana.effect according to the card type. Gains [Love] card upon use. [Death] - DEF Penetration increases by 600 for the duration of skill and gains immunity to CC for 6 sec. [Love] - The effect applies to all allies. [Luck] - Cooldown does not apply.

skill.name: Pathfinder of Fate
skill.description: All allies' ATK is increased by 5696, and Crit Chance is increased by 100. Ophelia gains additional effect according to the card in possession. [Death] - ATK is increased by 30%. [Love] - Per each sec, heals 7% of max HP. [Fortune] - M.Dodge Chance is increased by 200.

name: Pansirone
description: A girl that used to be a member of the Hound Unit. She shows no mercy even to those who surrendered and abandoned their weapons. She displays madness and wishes to burn everything in sight. As of right now, only Crow can control her madness. After the disbandment of the Hound Unit, she was reinstated as an officer at the Machine Division of the Empire and had been wandering from ruin to ruin, completing her assignments. She is infamous for not listening to her superiors or the system, making her known as a troublesome superior to other soldiers. The higher-ups regard her as a threat that may explode anytime. When it comes to her past endeavors, she becomes very protective. Thankfully, her colleagues from the Hound Unit do not try to pry into her past.

skill.name: A Present For You!
skill.description: Attacks the enemy and enemies neraby within a wide range, dealing 141224 P.DMG and inflicting them with 'Eternal Blaze'. Enemies inflicted with 'Eternal Blaze' take a total of 526140 P.DMG over 10 sec and their Heal Rate reduced by 25%. after use of this skill, [Now D.I.E!] can be used within 10 sec.

skill.name: Now D.I.E!
skill.description: Attacks enemies in a wide frontal range 7 times, dealing 72912 P.DMG each hit. If the target is not a Hero, deals 174990 additional P.DMG. Enemies inflicted with 'Eternal Blaze' take 23382 additional P.DMG each hit.

skill.name: The Thrill! How Exciting!!
skill.description: Hit enemies within range of self 12 times, dealing a total of 407556 P.DMG, and increasing own ATK by 64118 and DEF Penetration by 500 for 15 sec.

skill.name: Don't You Dare Run!
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 10 times, dealing a total of 950700 P.DMG. Attack the same target icnreases DMG by 7624 each hit.

skill.name: Cruel Delight
skill.description: Increawses ATK by 28496, and DMG dealt to Non-Hero enemies by 30%. Attacking enemies inflicted with 'Eternal Blaze' reignites 'Eternal Blaze'.

name: Pavel
description: A curious case of a human wizard possessed by the soul of an ice dragon. Having fought alongside Kyle 100 years ago, this ancient ice wizard has actually existed far before even then. The dragon's soul is usually asleep, but wakes up occasionally to speak to him in the voice of a lover. The empire considers him a key figure, and has dispatched Rodina to monitor and protect him. He himself, however, only wishes to live in peace and quiet, away from the concerns of the world.

skill.name: Wedge of Cold Snap
skill.description: Deal 291899 M.DMG to the targeted enemy and inflict Freeze for 5 sec. If any enemies are inflicted with Frost, deal DMG and inflict Freeze to them as well.

skill.name: Ice Spear
skill.description: Attacks random enemies 5 times, dealing 651850 M.DMG and inflicting Frost. When attacking enemies inflicted with Frost, creates an additional spear that deals extra half DMG. Additional spears do not inflict Frost. Enemies inflicted with Freeze take 50% increased DMG.

skill.name: Icy Conquest
skill.description: Deals 561405 M.DMG to all enemies. Enemies inflicted with Frost becomes inflicted with Freeze for 3 sec. Enemies inflicted with Freeze take 100% increased DMG.

skill.name: Chill of Early Dawn
skill.description: Deals 121859 M.DMG to 3 enemies every 15 sec and inflicts Frost on them to reduce their ATK Spd by 100 for 8 sec.

name: Phillop
description: He is the stout and upright king of the Dwarves. He fought alongside the Warrior of the Holy Sword against the Demon Army 100 years ago. His heroism in defeating the Dark Dragon Legion, the core division of the Demon Army, is well known throughout the land. In reality, he only sits on the throne out of a sense of obligation. Even as he complains about the boredom of his royal duties, he continues to work diligently.

skill.name: Collision
skill.description: Deals 98390 P.DMG and knocks the enemy down for 3 sec. Reduces hit enemy's P.DEF by 50% for 10 sec.

skill.name: Headbutt
skill.description: Dashes toward the enemy and deals 81138 P.DMG, knocking them back. Reduces hit enemies' ATK by 25% and  ATK Spd by 200 for 10 sec.

skill.name: Earth Incarnate
skill.description: Increases own All DEF by 29918 and All DMG Reduction by 250, heals 15% of own HP, and gains immunity to CC for 15 sec. This effect is irremovable.

skill.name: Destroy Armor
skill.description: Upon attacking, weakens enemy P.DEF by 3559 for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.

name: Priscilla
description: A former officer of Orvelia's armed forces. After a failed attempt to reveal the corruption of military leaders, she was driven out from her position. Wanting to conceal their corruption, the military leaders constantly sent out assassins to eliminate her. The long and lonely fight was beginning to take its toll on her, physically and mentally. One day, the aristocratic von Daphnel family offered her protection in exchange for her service. She accepted, and has been working as Aisha's maid in the Tower of Sage ever since. To this day, she faithfully carries out her duties as a maid bodyguard. However, she sends all her payments to an undisclosed recipient.

skill.name: Vital Strike
skill.description: Deals 311082 P.DMG to frontal enemies in range and stuns them for 1 sec. This attack always inflicts a Crit Hit.

skill.name: Coordination
skill.description: For 20 sec, places Priscilla and an ally with the highest ATK in 'Coordination' state, and dispels Negative Effects. Priscilla and the ally in Coordination State get an ATK boost equal to 15% of Priscilla's ATK + 18518.

skill.name: Turbulent Dance
skill.description: Deals 445692 P.DMG to nearby enemies in a circular range and draws them towards herself. If activated while in the 'Coordination' state, hit enemies take 30% extra P.DMG and M. DMG for 10 sec.

skill.name: Weapon Mastery
skill.description: Own ATK is increased by 26359 , and Penetration is increased by 100.

name: Rebel Clause
description: He had no special past, no superhuman strength, or no exceptional intellect. In a time when many orphans streamed out into the streets for countless reasons, Clause was just another ordinary, forgettable boy at the orphanage. He couldn't even remember who named him or whether his birthday was really his birthday. Ricardo was strict yet kind. but he could never stay at the orphanage for long. So the younger kids turned to Clause, who was only a couple of years older than them, for support and affection. Though Clause himself was just a small child, he quickly became used to taking care of and protecting someone. As a boy who took on this kind of responsibility without a doubt, it was only natural that Clause wanted to become a knight that protects others. Then he met Frey and Kasel. Among all the children at the orphanage, they were the most special. Their conversations, how they looked at him, and the time they spent toghether - all of them turned CLause from an ordinary boy into an extraordinary young man. Clause started calling Kasel and Frey his family. When other kids tried to tease the two, Clause would always up and take their side.There was a time when he believed that the threee of them would always remain a family, even if he became a knight and even if they all grew up and left the orphanage. He who abandoned the shield that failed to protect kept on reminding himself that the pain he felt every time he raised his sword was a punishment for his failure. But he knew he couldn't just stop and beat himself up forever. his family was waiting for him. They are waiting for him to rescue them, just like he always did in their childhood days. To end the long wait, to keep his dearest promise, Clause takes another step today. Even when the darkness covers your eyes, and the night is so long that you feel as if it will never end, do not worry. Don't be scared. The morning sun will rise. And I'll be right by your side, holding your hands.

skill.name: Determined Strike
skill.description: Deals 131671 P.DMG to frontal enmemies within range and inflicts Stun for 2 sec. If the target is a boss, deals 305302 additional P.DMG.

skill.name: Indomitable Will
skill.description: Deals 49114 P.DMG to nearby enemies, entering into the irremoveable state [Indomitable Will] for 10 sec. While in [Indomitable Will] state, ATK Spd is increased by 500 and the duration of CC inflicted upon self is reduced by 50%.

skill.name: Perish
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 6 times, dealing 75310 P.DMG each hit. Afterward, delivers an additional attack that deals 338895 P.DMG to nearby enemies and knocks them down for 3 sec.

skill.name: Power of Galicta
skill.description: Rebel Clause is not affected by Block stats, but his Crit Chance increases by 200, and when his DEF Penetration reaches 1000 or above, all of his attacks ignore the target's DEF. Additionally, his normal attack deal 92895 additional P.DMG to all enemies and inflict [Curse of Galicta] upon them for 6 sec. If the target is already inflicted with [Curse of Galicta], the target won't take additional DMG.

name: Rehartna
description: The owner and artisan of 'Aselerando', an instrument atelier located at the Empire's capital. Her cheerful personality, along with her gentle tone and diligence, is well-received by the customers. With her excellent customer service towards her regulars along with her great crafting skills, Rehartna is known as an accomplished entrepreneur even at a young age. She appears to be just an ordinary artisan, but in reality, she is actually a member of the Resistance. She works as an intel collector who also arranges contacts, and she mostly performs her duty while traveling around the Empire, disguised as a trader Rehartna is very punctual and heavy-mouthed individual who has earned great trust from her fellow Resistance comrades. Moreover, her atelier's backroom serves as one of the hideouts of the Resistance, providing space for Resistance members from different places to exchange information.

skill.name: Release! Ultrasonic Wave!
skill.description: Attacks frontal enemies in a straight line, dealing a total of 263148 P.DMG over 4 times. Each hit inflicts stun for 3 sec, and reduces enemies atk by 25% for 10 sec.

skill.name: Crystal Clear, Matimaruma!
skill.description: Immediately heals HP of the ally with the lowest HP by 307825, creating a shield that absorbs 558136 DMG and grants immunity to CC for 10 sec. While the shield is active, heals HP of all allies near the target by 81144 every sec, and increases All DEF by 26118. Enemies take 81144 DMG and have their ATK Spd reduced by 250.

skill.name: You've Never Seen a Weapon Like This!
skill.description: Reduces 4 random allies' Cooldown of all skills by 4 sec. For 15 sec, recovers allies Mana by 150 every sec and increases ATK by 94992. Upon every use, ATK Boost effect is increased by 9499.

skill.name: Battle March Melody
skill.description: At the beginning of each battle, heals HP of all allies by 188475, and increases Heal Rate by 10%. Heal Boost effect can be stacked up to max 3 times, and is irremovable.

name: Reina
description: Reina von Stein was born the daughter of a noble family of the empire. Her free spirit and energetic personality seem to brighten up even those around her. She prefers a life of freedom as a mercenary over the suffocating life of an aristocrat. After working as a mercenary for a long time, and she's already lost all traces of her noble upbringing in her manners. Even as a child, she showed a natural talent with swords. Over the years, she developed her skills with a rapier, using a style that best suited her lithe physique. Recently, she turned down a strange contract. Ever since then, she has been feeling as if someone has been following and watching her.

skill.name: Float Like a Butterfly
skill.description: Rapidly stabs the enemy, dealing 105405 P.DMG. Upon a Crit Hit, stacks 1 Wound and resets cooldown. Per every stacked Wound, DMG dealt by Float Like a Butterfly is increased by 20%. Gains immunity to all DMG while the skill is in use.

skill.name: Sharp End
skill.description: Displels negative effects from self and increases ATK by 40603 for 20 sec and increases Crit Chance by 500. This effect cannot be dispelled.

skill.name: Shooting Star
skill.description: Inflicts 859581 P.DMG upon enemy with a continuous attack. The last hit blows the enemy away.

skill.name: Lucky Child
skill.description: Upon a Crit Hit, ATK is increased by 9496 for 10 sec. Can be stacked up to 8 times max.

name: Rephy
description: This pure and kindhearted Tamian soul guide can communicate with the dead. The Tamian race lives in harmony with nature, and they have the ability to read its flow and guide the souls of the dead. Rephy's ability as a soul guide is exceptional, even for a Tamian. He uses it to guide the souls of those who died in the forest and help them pass on, preventing them from turning evil. He is the most capable among the Tamians in discerning the paths of the stars, pacifying the souls of the dead, and properly guiding them to the afterlife.

skill.name: Healing Soul
skill.description: Heals 4 allies with lowest HP 10% of Max HP, and heals extra 516968 HP over 8 sec. This effect cannot be dispelled.

skill.name: Salvation
skill.description: Dispels all negative effects. M.DEF is increased by 9255 for 20 sec.

skill.name: Soulrush
skill.description: Deals a total of 338500 M.DMG over 10 attacks to enemies within range. Hit enemies' ATK Spd is reduced by 25%.

skill.name: Spiritual Tuning
skill.description: Every 7 sec, an ally with the lowest Hp recovers 1 orb of mana and 101072 HP.

name: Requina
description: A curious merchant who deals every kind of poison known to mankind. She is a daughter of two wandering alchemists who traveled over from a distant nation. Other merchants call her 'the Merchant of Death,' but she has a different opinion. She claims that no poison is inherently evil, and that how one is used determines its nature. Like a true merchant, she believes that any tool is as good or evil as the one who uses it. Since the reappearance of the Demons, she has been traveling around, searching for the right poison to battle against the invaders.

skill.name: Tears of Mr. Python!
skill.description: Attacks 2 enemies and deals 247200 P.DMG, while poisoning them with Tears of Mr. Python that cannot be dispelled for 4.5 sec. Enemies inflicted with Tears of Mr. Python cannot recover mana, takes 30% increased DMG, and their Block chance is reduced by 500.

skill.name: Screechy Grass Extract!
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 3 times and deals a total of 471381 DMG, while poisoning them with Screechy Grass Extract for 6 sec. Enemies inflicted with Screechy Grass Extract have their ATK reduced by 30%, and Crit Chance by 500.

skill.name: More! Stronger!
skill.description: Own ATK is increased by 44885 for 20 sec and the effect of [Tears of Mr. Python], [Screechy Grass Extract], [Tickle Tickle Potion] is doubled. Also, target of [Tears of Mr. Python], [Screechy Grass Extract!], [Tickle Tickle Potion] is increased by 1.

skill.name: Tickle Tickle Potion!
skill.description: Upon attack, poisons target enemy with Tickle Tickle Potion for 10 sec which deals a total of 57420 P.DMG over time, and cannot be dispelled. Tickle Tickle Potion can be stacked max 50 times.

name: Ricardo
description: A hero who saved countless lives from the Demons, and the current commander of the Holy Knights of the Church of Lua. This brave and seasoned knight has been hunting down Demons all across Orvelia since his younger days. He is also the headmaster of the orphanage where Kasel, Frey, and Clause grew up. He trained countless warriors in Orvelia and is considered their spiritual leader. He is preparing to step down from the position due to his age, but his age-defying strength has always led to the denial of his retirement request.

skill.name: Destruction
skill.description: Deals 162581 P.DMG to frontal enemies in range and knocks them down for 3 sec.

skill.name: Divine Protection
skill.description: Deals 228955 P.DMG to enemies in range and inflicts Stun for 1 sec. Additionally, own M.DEF is increased by 7592 for 10 sec, and takes 80% of M.DMG instead of allies.

skill.name: Divine Judgment
skill.description: Attacks frontal enemies in a straight line 3 times. The first 2 attacks deal 98809 P.DMG to enemies and stun them for 4 sec, and the last attack deals 118422 P.DMG to enemies in a 20% wider range, while stunning them for 4 sec. Each attack has a 50% chance of dispelling positive effects from the enemy.

skill.name: Divine Blessing
skill.description: When allies excluding self take M.DMG, increases their M.DEF by 6644 for 5 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.

name: Riheet
description: An outlander who hails from an Orvel of another world that is similar, yet different. As inhabitants from a world where Dark Elves are oppressed by humans, the siblings Riheet and Ripine were quite confused with Orvel of this world, where racial discrimination isn't as prevalent. After seeing different races working together to build a better world, Riheet couldn't help but feel perplexed: he didn't know if he was angry or simply amused. In the world he came from, humans are but a sworn enemy to the Dark Elves, but it seems that such is not the case with the humans of this world...

skill.name: Black Moon Brand
skill.description: Deals 238448 M.DMG to frontal enemies within range, inflicting [Black Moon Brand] for 3 sec on hit targets and knocking them down for 3 sec. Upon hit, deals 3373 additional M.DMG that ignores Block per stack of [Otherworldly Curse]. Targets inflicted with [Black Moon Brand] cannot recover Mana for the duration.

skill.name: Black Moon Mark
skill.description: Dispels CC effects from self and leaves an irremovable [Black Moon Mark] on the target for 15 sec, dealinhg 128724 M.DMG. If there is an enemy inflicted with [Silver Moon Mark], Riheet attacks the target inflicted with [Silver Moon Mark] and changes the mark to [Full Moon Mark]. If the target is inflicted with [Full Moon Mark], [Full Moon Execution] becomes activated for 10 sec.

skill.name: Black Moon Strike
skill.description: Attacks the frontal area 10 times, dealing a total of 444880 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 2 sec. Afterward, delivers a final blow that deals 261945 M.DMG and 5622 additional M.DMG that ignores Block per stack [Otherworldly Curse]. While in use, gains immunity to all CC effects.

skill.name: Otherworldly Mana
skill.description: Uses Otherworldly Mana to increase own DMG dealt to enemies by 35% and inflict 1 stack of [Otherworldly Curse] on the target each hit, [Otherworldly Curse] can be stacked up to max 30 times.

skill.name: Full Moon Execution
skill.description: Dispels CC effects from self and attacks an enemy inflicted with [Full Moon Mark] 2 times, dealind 232440 M.DMG. The last hit explodes [Full Moon Mark], dealing 128094 M.DMG that ignores Block. If the targets is not a Hero, deals 442400 additional M.DMG that ignores Block. Upon exploding [Full Moon Mark], deals 11244 additional M.DMG that ignores Block per stack of [Otherworldly Curse]. This skill is used together with [Ripine]. If this Skill kills an enemy, Cooldown of [Black Moon Mark] and Ripine's [Silver Moon Mark] will be reset.

name: Ripine
description: An outlander who hails from an Orvel of another world that is similar, yet different. As inhabitants from a world where Dark Elves are oppressed by humans, the siblings Riheet and Ripine were quite confused with Orvel of this world, where racial discrimination isn't as prevalent. After seeing different races working together to build a better world, Ripine hoped that her world will someday also strive to become the ideal world... However, she was well aware that there are things that needed to be taken care of in her world and wished to return to her world to finish the deed.

skill.name: Silver Moon Gust
skill.description: Deals a total of 336232 M.DMG to the target over 4 times and delivers an additional attack that deals 240300 M.DMG and inflicts Stun on the target for 2 sec. The last hit deals 3703 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF per stack of [Otherworldly Curse].

skill.name: Silver Moon Mark
skill.description: Dispels CC effects from self and moves to the farthest enemy to inflict an irremovable [Silver Moon Mark] for 15 sec, dealing 132024 M.DMG. If there is an enemy inflicted with [Black Moon Mark], Ripine attacks the target inflicted with [Black Moon Mark] and changes the mark to [Full Moon Mark]. If target is inflicted with [Full Moon Mark], [Full Moon Execution] becomes activated for 10 sec. Ripine prioritizes the target inflicted with [Silver Moon Mark] or [Full Moon Mark].

skill.name: Silver Moon Bladestorm
skill.description: Attacks the target 5 times, dealing a total of 348575 M.DMG and delivers an additional attack that deals 264048 M.DMG. The last hit deals 6172 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF per stack of [Otherworldly Curse].

skill.name: Otherworldly Mana
skill.description: Uses Otherworldly Mana to increase own DMG dealt to enemies by 35% and inflict 1 stack of [Otherworldly Curse] on the target each hit, [Otherworldly Curse] can be stacked up to max 30 times.

skill.name: Full Moon Execution
skill.description: Dispels CC effects from self and attacks an enemy inflicted with [Full Moon Mark] 2 times, dealind 241240 M.DMG. The last hit explodes [Full Moon Mark], dealing 204678 M.DMG that ignores DEF. If the target is not a Hero, deals 503577 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF. Upon exploding [Full Moon Mark], deals 13578 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF per stack of [Otherworldly Curse]. This skill is used together with [Riheet]. If this Skill kills an enemy, Cooldown of [Silver Moon Mark] and Riheet's [Black Moon Mark] will be reset.

name: Rodina
description: The empire's top ranking sniper, and a lover of bears. She likes them so much that she always wears accessories resembling a bear's ears on her hat. So, she'll sometimes hunts tigers, but she'll never shoot a bear. Although her shooting skills are most suitable for assassination, she swore to never use them for unjust reasons. Instead, she uses them to protect others. Currently, she lives with Pavel in the Windland Snow Mountain as his personal guard delegated by the empire.

skill.name: Penetration Shot
skill.description: Upon activation, takes up a stance and starts casting. After casting ends, deals 217946 P.DMG upon enemies in a straight line. DMG is increased by 150% in proportion to the total casting time. If casting progresses beyond the 3rd stage, knock over enemies.

skill.name: Target Aim
skill.description: Target receives 50% increased damage from this hero. In addition, own ATK is increased by 26833.

skill.name: Focused Fire
skill.description: Fires 10 shots at random. Deals 175615 DMG upon attack, and per each attack, DMG is increased by 10%.

skill.name: Rapid Shot
skill.description: Every 10 sec, attacks the target 2 times, dealing a total of 492616 P.DMG.

name: Roi
description: He is Cleo's escort and is protecting her at Dominiks's request. A former member of a group of assassins, he risked his life and went rogue for some unknown reason. Having lived as an assassin, he rarely shows much respect toward others, but his hardships have made him an experienced and shrewd man who treats those who help him with fairness.

skill.name: Merciless
skill.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times, dealing a total of 369080 P.DMG and increasing P.DMG the target takes 25% for 10 sec. Affterward, each hit inflicts 1 stack of [Mortal Wound] that deals 59248 P.DMG over 16 sec. [Mortal Wound] can be stacked up to max 5 times.

skill.name: Curtain of Darkness
skill.description: Increases all allies' ATK by 81214 and, P.Dodge by 250 for 10 sec. Affterward, Roi grants [Specter's Breath] upon self for 10 sec. For the duration of [Specter's Breath]. increases own ATK Spd by 250, DMG dealt to enemies by 20%, and evades all P.DMG attacks.

skill.name: Blade Claw
skill.description: Moves behind the enemy deals 303167 P.DMG. Consumes stack of [Mortal Wound] from the target, adding 34020 P.DMG for every 1 stack. Upon a Crit Hit, recovers 2 orbs of Mana and resets Cooldown of [Hack].

skill.name: Hack
skill.description: Increases Crit Chance by 300. If a normal attack is landed as a Crit Hit, attacks the target 6 times, dealing a total of 218070 additional P.DMG and inflicting a stack of [Mortal Wound] with a 50% chance.

name: Scarlet
description: King Veroglance the Second of Orvelia grew weaker by the day. He was once a stout monarch whom no one dared to cross. However, he, too, began to show weakness with age. When he finally fell ill, those with aspirations of power began gathering around him like flies. Scarlet tried her hardest to protect her father in this chaos. But the man being swayed by the flatterers around him was no longer the respected king she once knew. The king turned his back on his daughter's pleas. The nobles were unhappy to accept her, the king's only child, as the next queen, to say the least. The atmosphere of the royal palace darkened quickly. She knows. The nobles would pressure her incessantly. But she would never yield. She is prepared to fight to protect her kingdom, to protect her people. She would never let those who are greedy for power to take control of the kingdom. No matter what...

skill.name: Halt!
skill.description: Attacks all frontal enemies, dealing 219087 P.DMG and knocking them down for 3 sec. If the target is not a Hero, deals 219087 additional P.DMG. Heals HP equal to 30% of DMG dealt.

skill.name: Justice Served!
skill.description: Dispels negative effects of all allies and dispels positive effects of all enemies, while dealing 162091 P.DMG.

skill.name: Sword of Honor!!
skill.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times, dealing a total of 273993 P.DMG. Fires an energy blast from the sword, dealing 249231 P.DMG to enemies in a straight line, blinding them for 5 sec.

skill.name: Goddess of War
skill.description: Increases own All Crit Resistance increases by 150. Normal attacks have a 10% chance of dealing 101513 additional P.DMG and inflicting Stun on the target for 1 sec. Each hit increases P.DMG the target takes by 3%. This effect can be stacked up to max 10 times.

name: Selene
description: This noble Elven princess admires the Holy Sword and its chosen warrior. She strives as much as she can to do what's right, and wants others to do the same. This is why she offers genuine criticism to anyone who strays from the path of righteousness, even if it's the Warrior of the Holy Sword. Unfortunately, her stout resolve is sometimes taken the wrong way by others. She often visits her younger sister Dosarta at her tower to keep her company.

skill.name: Arrow Rain
skill.description: Shoots 12 arrows to random enemies and deals a total of 695184 P.DMG.

skill.name: Rush
skill.description: Upon attacking, summons 5 arrows that launch towards the enemy. Each arrow deals 126345 P.DMG.

skill.name: Moonlight Flash
skill.description: Fires an arrow in a straight line, dealing P.DMG to all enemies in range based on the target's remaining HP. Deals a maximum of 738818 P.DMG and knocks down the target. Against Bosses, deals additional 275160 P.DMG that ignores DEF.

skill.name: Moonlight Arrow
skill.description: Upon attacking, increases ATK by 5696 and Crit Chance by 100 for 10 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

name: Seria
description:
The 101st Heir of ShadowHilt and the sister of Erze. People call her cold-blooded for her unfriendly attitude, but she used to be all smiles when she was around her beloved sister, Erze. Seria always felt sorry for her feeble sister and was overprotective of her, without realizing that it was actually putting Erze in greater despair. One day, Erze fell into a trap during a mission. She was saved, but her sickness started to worsen dramatically. Meanwhile, Seria was sent to Windland Snow Moutain to follow the traces of the Vampire Princess. She had a glimpse of what was going on with her sister, but she left for the top-priority mission, praying that she was wrong. However, the tragedy struck the sisters is if mocking Seria's prayers.
- Oh my beloved sister, Seria!
Seria returned to find the corpses of her comrades lying on the ground, cold as ice. Erze welcomed her with two sharp fangs, thirsting for blood. Seria trembled with waves of emotions. Her heart was breaking, yet she spoke in a cold, calm tone.
- You....you are not my little sister anymore. You're a filthy bloodsucker.

skill.name: Mysterious Sword - Falling Petals
skill.description: Performs a horizontal slash to the front and deals 181520 M.DMG to the target and enemies in a narrow range. Can activate [Mysterious Sword - Blossom] once within 5 sec after use.

skill.name: Mysterious Sword - Blossom
skill.description: Performs a vertical slash to the front and deals 193079 M.DMG to the target and enemies in a narrow range.

skill.name: Blood Scattering Blade
skill.description: Rapidly charges forward to deal 32677 M.DMG and inflicts irremovable Original Sin of Blood on enemies for 3 sec. Enemies under Original Sin of Blood have their ATK Spd reduced by 300.
