Shortly afterward, attacks enemies under Original Sin of Blood 2 times, and deals additional 108184 M.DMG, and if the target is not a hero, deals additional 105928 DEF Ignoring M.DMG.

skill.name: Red Moon Blade
skill.description: Brandishes a moon-bloodying sword, dealing 423175 M.DMG to enemies in a wide range. If the target is not a Hero, deals 272537additional  M.DMG that ignores DEF. When the moon is full, gains Moonlight for 1 sec, and when cast at this state, deals 467966 M.DMG to enemies and reduces their Heal Rate by 100%. If the target is not a hero, deals 286320 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF. While using the Skill, Seria is not affected by changes in ATK Spd.

skill.name: Cold-Blooded Witch
skill.description: Increases ATK by 43455. Upon a Criti Skill hit, own Crit DMG by 10% and DMG dealt to Non-Hero enemies by 1%. This effect can be stacked up to max 15 times and is irremovable.

name: Shamilia
description: A powerful Demon who used to be one of the officers serving Dark Lord Angmund. She is capable of holding all of the curses in the world. But her real goal isn't the resurrection of the Dark Lord, nor world domination. Everything that happens in the world is a part of a drama, and she thinks of herself as the audience. Her actions are like that of a scriptwriter who revises the scenario, pulling the strings from the shadows and looking forward to how the scenes she's written play out.

skill.name: Curse of Petrification
skill.description: Attacks an enemy dealing 219192 M.DMG and inflicting Curse of Petrification for 3 seconds that can't be dispelled. The enemy under the Curse of Petrification will have ATK Spd reduced by 200 , and this effect gets stronger up to max 600% as time passes. When the curse ends, petrifies the target for 3 seconds.

skill.name: Curse of Time
skill.description: Attacks an enemy inflicting 173941 M.DMG and also inflicts Curse of Time for 10 seconds, increasing all skill cooldown by 1.5 seconds. All skill cooldowns of the enemy under the Curse of Time increases by 1 seconds every 3 seconds.

skill.name: Curse of Pain
skill.description: Attacks en enemy dealing 512927 M.DMG and inflicting knockback. Also inflicts Curse of Pain for 8 seconds, dealing a total of 390080 M.DMG over time.

skill.name: The Vessel of Curses
skill.description: At the beginning of every battle, for 10 seconds, obtains The Vessel of Curses, creates a shield that cannot be canceled, and absorbs 130726 damage. For the duration of the shield, gains Immunity to CC. Upon the activation of the skill, consumes The Vessel of Curses to have 4 enemies as the target.

name: Shea
description: Listening to the beautiful melody on the battlefield makes me wonder if I am truly in the middle of a battlefield.' 'I dropped the sword from my hand. All the other soldiers present also dropped their swords.' 'It felt as though the girl was in an entirely different plane of existence, removed from the rest of us.' The sensational tale of the pink-haired girl, whose sudden appearance and performance stopped the battle, quickly spread. Her beautiful, captivating melody and her demure, lovely presence has captured everyone's imagination. However, no one really knew where she came from or where she was headed. 'She seemed kind of strange to me, the way she was talking to thin air, as if there was somebody there...' Of course, some have suggested more convincing theories on the girl’s whereabouts, but her mysterious beauty has drowned out all speculation.

skill.name: Green Nature's Melody
skill.description: Heals all allies' HP by a total 437344 over 8 times, and reduced All DMG all allies take by 35% for 8 sec. If used during [Trance] state,  this Skill's Heal Rate increases by 100% and changes the DMG Reduction Effect to 70%.

skill.name: Blue Wind's Song
skill.description: Recovers  all allies Mana by a total of 640 over 8 times, heals HP of a target with max Mana by 68334, and reduces the duration of CC effects by 50% for 8 sec. If used during [Trance] state, this Skill's Mana Recovery and Heal Rate increase by 50%, and all allies will gain Immunity to CC for 8 sec.

skill.name: Dance of Red Passion
skill.description: Deals a total of 297040 M.DMG to all enemies over 8 times, and increases ATK of all allies by 71244 for 8 sec. If used during [Trance] state, this Skill's DMG and ATK Boost increase by 100%, and continuously displels all enemies' positive effects.

skill.name: Trance
skill.description: After Skill is used, Shea gains 1 stack of [Blissful Perfomance]. If Shea uses her next Skill when she has 3 stacks of [Blissful Perfomance], Shea consumes [Blissful Perfomance] and heals HP of all allies by 180271 and enters [Trance] state for 12 sec. [Blissful Perfomance] and [Trance] are irremovable.

name: Sonia
description: A combat homunculus created by a wizard in Orvel, who used the heart of Vikal the Lightning Beast as her core. After gaining self-awareness in the creation process, she fled the laboratory and spent the next few years at Ricardo's orphanage. She is capable of casting powerful lightning magic at will. As a combat homunculus, she boasts excellent physical abilities as well. Beneath her appearance as a young girl, she is a confused war machine searching for the meaning of her existence. The wizards of the Tower of Sage bestowed her the title of 'Blue' to indicate her mastery over chant-less spell casting. However, she distrusts wizards and has no desire to associate herself with the Tower.

skill.name: Lightning Strike!
skill.description: Causes an electric explosion ahead, dealing 120402 M.DMG to enemies in range and placing an electric field for 3 sec. The electric field deals a total of 173690 M.DMG over 10 attacks and with 25% chance, stuns the enemy for 0.5 sec.

skill.name: Power of Lightning!
skill.description: For 10 sec, ATK is increased by 56992 and all DEF is increased by 56992. While the skill is in use, each auto attack has a 30% chance of dealing extra 135344 M.DMG to 2 random enemies and stunning them for 0.5 sec.

skill.name: Electric Explosion!
skill.description: Deals a total of 160542 M.DMG over 3 attacks to nearby enemies in a circular range. Then causes an Electric Explosion, dealing a total of 240804 M.DMG over 3 attacks and stunning them for 5 sec.

skill.name: Shock
skill.description: With every attack, injects Electricity to targets not inflicted by Shock and increases M.DMG taken by 1% for 10 sec. Electricity can be stacked up to 30 times, and the 30th stack will consume all Electricity to deal 334703 M.DMG and Shock the target for 7 sec. Enemies inflicted by Shock take 70% increased M.DMG, and when they are inflicted by Stun, the duration is increased by 0.7 sec.

name: Taily
description: There exist many animal hybrids in the world, but even among those animal hybrids, the origin of the Shuti tribe is considered extraordinary. It is told that once upon a time, a valiant canine used a stone of supernatural power to create a technique that allows one to transcend the limits of the physical body temporarily. That technique was passed down to several successors, and they gathered to form the 'Shuti' tribe. They then promptly sanctified the stone that started it all, and called it the 'Lucky Stone.' They cherished the stone in their hearts, and whenever they would use the technique, they would even chant and shout the name 'Lucky Stone.' But for some unknown reason, the Lucky Stone vanished without leaving a trace, and this caused the Shuti tribe to wander endlessly in search of the stone. Even now, the Shuti tribe leads a nomadic lifestyle, moving from one place in another, to find the stone. The recovery of the stone has become the long-cherished desire of the Shuti tribe. Recently, the Shuti tribe was blessed with the advent of young Taily, a Valiant Knight Commander who has stepped up to represent her tribe, and fulfill their greatest wish. When Taily managed to inscribe the strongest seal in history onto Prochika, the iconic hammer of the Shuti tribe, Taily rose to become the hero who will finally fulfill the long-lingering wish of the tribe. Carrying the wish of her tribe on her shoulders, brave Taily sets off to find the Lucky Stone that is hiding out there in the world somewhere. Though it should be noted that Taily's journey is often interrupted by all kinds of animal hybrids who want to sabotage her journey, and Taily often finds herself straying away from the main objective because of that.

skill.name: BOOM! Here Goes!
skill.description: Attacks frontal enemies in a straight line, dealing 94601 P.DMG, inflicting Stun for 2 sec, and reducing All Block Chance by 350 for 8 sec. Afterward, deals 127849 P.DMG to enemies within range and knocks them down for 3 sec.

skill.name: Protection! Was dat Lucky Stone?
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from self, and while charging energy, Taily takes 50% reduced DMG. When fully charged, increases own Heal Rate by 25% and All DEF by 52244 for 10 sec. If this Skill is activated with 50 or more [Emblem of Courage] stacks, applies the effect to all allies and consumes all of the [Emblem of Courage] stacks.

skill.name: Charge! Knight Commander Power!
skill.description: Deals 296040 P.DMG over 5 times to nearby enemies in a circular range of self and gains [Power of da Shuti Tribe] stacks. Afterward, gathers strength and delivers a final blow, dealing 254252 P.DMG and increases All DMG the target takes by 30%+[2% per stack of Power of da Shuti Tribe] for 10 sec, and inflicts Stun for 3 sec. [Power of da Shuti Tribe] can be stacked up to max 30 times.

skill.name: Blessing of da Shuti Tribe!
skill.description: When HP percentage is 30% or above, attacks nearby enemies in range every sec, dealing 115769 P.DMG. Taily gains an irremovable stack of [Emblem of Courage] each hit. Each stack of [[Emblem of Courage] increases All DEF of all allies by 707. [Emblem of Courage] can be stacked up to max 50 times. When HP percentage is 30% or below, increases own All Block Chance by 700.

name: Talisha
description: Anyone who's been to the streets of Orvel has met this girl at least once. She passes on useful information to others at the Orvel Plaza, gives directions, and sometimes offers advice like a friend. She knows many people and is very experienced, but also sometimes gives others quite a shock by being friendly towards an unexpected person. Though she looks like a regular wanderer who enjoys traveling at first glance, she has a rather concrete goal; 'to see the most beautiful soul.' Ever since she was young, Talisha could see the lights of souls by using jewels. Clever Talisha soon realized that it was a special power only given to her, and she often enjoyed peeking into other people's souls. Later, she chose to be an information dealer because she could see more people, and meeting more people meant more lights of souls. As time passed, she became more and more skilled as an information dealer and soul appraiser. She learned that the best jewels to appraise souls were crystals imbued with mana. The more mana there was, the better she could see, and the more souls she appraised, the brighter the gem shone. She also learned that the colour of people's souls never stayed the same, and were constantly changing. Talisha, captivated by the beautiful colour and hues of the souls, wanted to appraise even more souls. She wanted to see the constantly changing brilliance of the souls and the momentary flash of glittering light with her very own eyes. In order to do that, she needed crystals that were imbued with lots of mana. Naturally, those kind of crystals were very rare and expensive. Talisha gave out information to gather crystals and people, and sometimes she herself would set out to find the source of some rumors. In the process, she once worked in a partnership with 'the owner of the Gold Bar', but due to a particular event, they became quite hostile towards each other, and ended up not even being able to stand hearing the other' name. Of course, to Talisha, that was just one of the 'small things' that happened during her journey. Talisha met Dosarta, who waits for the day when she can finally leave the Tower of Challenge, Turan, who Talisha considers a sister, a noble lady who she briefly met in Penteonia, Evan, the kind alchemist, and the energetic Commander Taily... Talisha saw the colour of all their souls and committed every one of them to memory. Even the soul of the Gold Bar's owner, whom she didn't even want to think about. Talisha was content with her life, and firmly believed she would be happy if she could continue to travel and see souls. But one day, she came across a particular gossip. It was a rumor that The Crystal of Blue Water, which had never been seen before and was treated as an old legend, had finally appeared. In Talisha's content life, a single question started to form. What would she be able to see if she looked at a soul with that crystal? If she saw the world's most beautiful soul with it, how brilliantly would those colours shine? Talisha made a decision. She promised herself that she would get her hands on that crystal by any means, and see the most brilliant flash of light.

skill.name: Radiance of Cimatis
skill.description: Deals 262231 M.DMG to the target and neartby enemies. Upon attacking the same target with this skill within 7 sec, deals 239939 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF. Cooldown will be applied every time this Skill is used 2 times.

skill.name: Dance of Luberry
skill.description: Attacks the target and nearby enemies within a small range 9 times, dealing a total of 388116 M.DMG and inflicting Stun on the target for 1 sec each hit. If the target is a boss, the last hit deals 172346 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF.

skill.name: Splendor of Cimatis
skill.description: Explodes Cimatis around the target, dealing 193125 M.DMG and creating [Splendor of Cimatis] for 10 sec. [Splendor of Cimatis] recovers Mana of allies within range by 400 every sec and deals 30703 M.DMG to enemies within range every sec.

skill.name: Full Bloom of Luberry
skill.description: Explodes Luberry in front of self, healing HP of allies within range by 147415 and creating [Full Bloom of Luberry] for 10 sec. [Full Bloom of Luberry] heals HP of all allies within range by 25825 every sec and reduces ATK of Enemies within range by 30%.

skill.name: Crystal of Resonance
skill.description: Talisha projects Light of Luberry to the crystal she owns, healing own HP by 101047 and changes [Radicance of Cimatis] and [Splendor of Cimatis] to [Dance of Luberry] and [Full Bloom of Luberry] respectively. Upon using this Skill again, Talisha projects Light of Cimatis to the crystal and recovers Mana by 500.

skill.name: Brilliant Gemologist
skill.description: Talisha appraises a gem, increasing ATK by 6170 and DMG dealt to non-Hero enemies by 1% every sec. This effect can be stacked up to max 30 times.

name: Tanya
description: An assassin of the Laughing Mask, and Roi's colleague. Although she has a physical advantage over Roi as a Half-Elf, she lacks his worldly wisdom and his ability to connect with others, traits that made him crucial in large-scale operations. This has given her something of an inferiority complex. As the 'Cleaner' of the organization, she was tasked with eliminating any traitors. When Roi abandoned the organization, she set out to chase him to figure out his motivation, leaving all her other tasks behind. Her plans after finding him remain to be seen.

skill.name: Target Sighted
skill.description: Increases P.DMG the enemy with the lowest P.DEF takes by 30% for 10 sec, and moves behind the target, dealing 167461 P.DMG and knocking it down for 2 sec. If used during Stealth, 150% increased Crit DMG applies, and Stealth is dispelled. If Skill is used while not in Stealth, becomes Stealth for 10 sec.

skill.name: Blade Tornado
skill.description: Attacks nearby enemies 3 times and deals a total of 333339 P.DMG, inflicting 1 stack of Bleed per each hit. If used in a Stealth state, target's heal rate is reduced by 70%, and Stealth is dispelled. If Skill is used while not in Stealth, becomes Stealth for 10 sec.

skill.name: Whisper of Death
skill.description: Attacks a random enemy 6 times and deals a total of 947466 P.DMG, then deals an extra that deals 297146 P.DMG. If used during Stealth, dispels positive effects from the Target, and Stealth is dispelled. If Skill is used while not in Stealth, becomes Stealth for 10 sec.

skill.name: Silent Ambush
skill.description: Increases Crit Chance by 300 and Dodge by 300 during Stealth. Upon a Critical Skill Hit, deals 69004 additional P.DMG to the enemy and inflicts Silence for 2 sec. If the target is not a Hero, deals 48199 additional P.DMG that ignores DEF and reduces the target's ATK Spd by 200 for 10 sec.

name: Theo
description: A knight who served the Republic of Gray 100 years ago, and an admirer of Jane Gray. Theo was the First Knight of the Republic and the wielder of the Lightning Legios. During the Duchy's battle against the Demon Army, the Mountain Fortress went on a rampage when its seal was lifted. Under Jane's order, Theo set out to contain it. In his absence, powerful Demon officers attacked the royal palace. Theo returned to fight them despite heavy injury, but was unable to defeat them by himself. When the battle was over, he held the body of the princess in his arms and cried out from the ruins of the palace. Suddenly, a mysterious entity offered him a chance to defend his princess for all eternity. When he accepted, he fell into a deep slumber.

skill.name: Final Crash
skill.description: Attacks 16 times, dealing a total of 361408 M.DMG to enemies in range. Upon each Crit Hit, Crit DMG is increased by 3% for 10 sec, and there is a 30% chance to deal 23776 extra M.DMG, inflicting stun for 0.3 sec. Crit DMG boost can be stacked up to 30 times max.

skill.name: God of Lightning
skill.description: Upon casting, activates 'God of Lightning' and throws a spear of lightning at the enemy, dealing 221647 M.DMG. Hit enemy takes 50% increased M.DMG for 10 sec. While in 'God of Lightning' state, increases activation chance of 'For Jane' is increased by 40% and ATK is increased by 71244 for 15 sec.

skill.name: Lightning Explosion
skill.description: Jumps and strikes, thrusting the spear to the ground and hitting target enemy and enemies in range 5 times, dealing a total of 346445 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec.

skill.name: For Jane
skill.description: Each auto attack has a 20% chance of dealing 122422 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 0.7 sec.

name: Veronica
description: A genius scholar from the Tower of Sage who remembers everything she sees. After developing her own theories and systems of Rune Magic, she quickly grew bored and moved onto a different subject. Soon, she was appointed as the highest ranking royal secretary of finance. Unfortunately, many politicians refused to accept a commoner as their superior. After many lies and ill rumors, Veronica eventually decided to leave the palace on her own. But this was hardly a defeat for her, and she soon set out to conquer a new path. She headed to the Orvel Guild Alliance, where she would be measured only by her abilities and nothing else. As expected, her incredible perception and analytical skills made her an indispensable asset to numerous guilds.

skill.name: This will hurt a little!
skill.description: Deals 215290 M.DMG to enemy and surrounding enemies within range, and inflicts Stun for 2 sec.

skill.name: Let me help you.
skill.description: Grants a Rune to all allies to increase their ATK by 56992 and any DMG to bosses by 15% for 12 sec.

skill.name: Get out of my sight!
skill.description: Attacks target and enemies in a wide surrounding area 2 times to deal 392862 M.DMG, and knocks them down for 5 sec. Hit enemies take 30% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.

skill.name: Top Financier's Knowledge
skill.description: Increases ATK of all allies by 5696 and gains Experience stack upon using a Skill. When 3 Experiences are stacked, gains Top Financier's Knowledge that increases own Crit DMG by 30% and the effects of all active Skills by 10%. The Top Financier's Knowledge effect is irremovable and stacks up to 5 times.

name: Viska
description: A maverick among Demons who seeks to grow her own power by devouring other powerful Demons. She embodies the worst possible meaning of the word Demon. She crossed the dimensional rift to seek out and devour the Demons who traveled to the earthly realm. She placed a limit on her own power and assumed the form of a sickly young girl to further humiliate her victims. She detests weaklings who pretend to be strong. On the other hand, she respects those who recognize their own weaknesses and risk their lives in the pursuit of strength.

skill.name: Meal Time!!
skill.description: Deals 217775 M.DMG to frontal enemies in range. For 10 sec, Hit enemies' ATK is reduced by 25% for and own ATK is increased by 42740. If used while holding 3 or more stacks of Soul, shackles the enemy for 3 sec.

skill.name: I'll slice you up!!
skill.description: Moves behind the target, dispelling positive effects and dealing 184564 M.DMG, increases M.DMG the target takes by 25% for 15 sec, and knock it down. If used while holding 3 or more stacks of Soul, reduces enemy M.DEF by 30% for 15 sec.

skill.name: I'll rip you to pieces!!
skill.description: Deals 343869 M.DMG to enemies in a wide surrounding area, and inflicts Stun for 3 sec. If used while holding 5 stacks of Soul, consumes all stacks to reset the cooldown of this skill.

skill.name: Yummy Souls!
skill.description: Enemies attacked with Viska's skills lose Souls. Upon losing their Soul, targets take 32032 extra M.DMG, and per each soul stacked, Viska's HP is healed by 63853 and Mana is healed by 300. Souls last until they are used, can't be dispelled and can be stacked up to 5 times max.

name: Xerah
description: A girl that the Tidhar created to discretely impose their will on the world. She hides her identity, conceiling herself amidst the shadows, operating among regular people. Her main purpose is to gather the power of darkness for the advent and find a vessel to contain it. She did find an ideal vessel from the ancient kingdom of Sekireinel and a certain mighty-being thwarted her plans. But Xerah was not frustrated nor disappointed. The longer it took, the more she'll enjoy destroying this world.

skill.name: Orbs of Darkness
skill.description: Throws 6 orbs of darkness, dealing a total of 350658 M.DMG to a random enemy and enemies in a circular range of the target. When Xerah is in [Darkness Awakened] state, increases DMG of [Orbs of Darkness] by x2, and reduces Cooldown by 100%. [Crest of Extortion Level 1 Effect] Destroys shield from the target.

skill.name: Crest of Extortion
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from self and casts Crest of Extortion that lasts permanently on self. If Xerah already possesses a Crest of Extortion, the level of Crest of Extortion increases instead. [Crest of Extortion] Deals 189967 M.DMG to a random enemy every 5 sec. Level 1: Adds an additional effect to [Orbs of Darkness] Skill. Level 2: Effect activation interval changes to 4 sec, and adds an additional effect to [Blood Moon] Skill. Level 3: Effect activation interval changes to 3 sec, and [Crest of Extortion] Skill changes to [Crest Bestowal] Skill.

skill.name: Crest Bestowal
skill.description: Upon use, dispels negative effects from self and bestows the power of the Crest of Extortion to an ally with the lowest HP. The ally instantly recovers 1 orb of Mana, heals its HP by a total of 515420 for 5 sec, and gains Immunity to CC.

skill.name: Blood Moon
skill.description: Creates a [Blood Moon] for 10 sec. For the duration of Blood Moon, increases ATK of all allies by 80740, reduces DMG taken by 20%, deals a total of 850510 M.DMG to all enemies, and reduces their Heal Rate by 50%. [Crest of Extortion Level 2 Effect] Boosts the effect all allies receive by x2.

skill.name: Darkness Awakened
skill.description: Upon using a Skill, if Xerah is not in Darkness Awakened state, gains an irremovable stack of [Darkness]. Upon gaining 4 [Darkness] stacks, Xerah consumes the stacks to enter [Darkness Awakened] state that is irremovable for 10 sec, increasing Lifesteal by 200 and dealing 50% increased DMG to Non-Hero enemies. When Xerah takes fatal DMG while in [Darkness Awakened] state, [Darkness Awakened] becomes deactivated, consumes entire Mana of self, and heals HP by 30%. Afterward, Xerah cannot gain any Darkness stacks for 10 sec.

name: Yanne
description: A Barbarian warrior who specializes in dealing with monsters that threaten people. Thanks to a unique physical trait, her muscular strength is several times stronger than that of a normal Barbarian warrior. She wields a greatbow larger than her own body with such ease that people call her a walking siege weapon. While she is a kindhearted woman who enjoys helping others, once engaged in a combat, her Barbarian aggressiveness begins to surface. She once slayed a mad dragon named Svelta, a feat that earned her the nickname Dragon Slayer.

skill.name: Focus Shot!
skill.description: Taking up a stance, focuses for a while and deals 226461 P.DMG to enemies in a straight line. If the target is a dragon, inflicts Stun for 3 sec. The longer she focuses, DMG and Stun duration are increased by 100%.

skill.name: Wipeout!
skill.description: Deals 314476 P.DMG to target enemy and other enemies in range. If the target is a Dragon, deals 250496 extra DMG that ignores DEF.

skill.name: No Holding Back!
skill.description: Dispels all negative effects from self. For 30 sec, ATK is increased by 36096 and Penetration by 500. For the duration of skill, normal attacks consume 3% Mana to deal DMG to all enemies in a straight line and deals 41796 additional P.DMG that ignores DEF to Dragons. This effect is irremovable.

skill.name: Dragon Slayer
skill.description: ATK is increased by 10685 , and Max HP is increased by 30%. Also, DMG dealt to Dragons is increased by 100%.

name: Yuria
description: If one asks who the most famous tailor is in Orbis Continent, most people won't know who to name. However, those who know a thing or two about clothing will never fail to bring up Yuria's name. Yuria, a tailor from Penteonia, always has two conditions that she sets when accepting requests. First, the client needs to allow Yuria to spend some time with the client so that she draws inspiration as to what kind of clothing she would make. Second, while she is with the client, the client must not lie or pretend to be something they are not. The first condition is for her sense of 'Foresight.' She needs to feel the client's thread of fate so she can express it through clothing. The second condition is mainly because she can sense the truth and finds lies disgusting. She doesn't want to make anything for anyone who won't be true. Her masterpieces, made with the fate she's read, are as valuable as starlight. Even the nobles would be envious of them.

skill.name: Binding Karma
skill.description: Deals 285387 M.DMG that ignores M.Block to 2 enemies and reduces their Mana by 500. If the target is affected by 'Threading Destiny', deals DMG that ignores DEF, and 'Threading Destiny' will be removed.

skill.name: Starlight Sewing
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from self and casts a shield that absorbs 425964 DMG for 10 sec. While the shield active, gains immunity to CC, increases Crit Chance by 300, and increases the number of targets that Yuria attacks by 1.

skill.name: Circle of Fate
skill.description: Deals 424754 M.DMG to 2 enemies, increasing the M.DMG they take by 30% for 10 sec and inflicting 'Threading Destiny' for 5 sec. Enemies under 'Threading Destiny' have their ATK Spd reduced by 250.

skill.name: Blessing of Truth
skill.description: Increases own All DEF by 9737 and ATK Spd by 300. Normal attacks hit 2 enemies. Every normal attack inflicts a stack of 'Stigma of Stars' upon enemies. Targets take 1% increased M.DMG for every stack of 'Stigma of Stars'. This effect can be stacked up to max 15 times and is irremovable.

name: Zafir
description: A Prince and successor to the God King of the ancient desert kingdom who possesses the power to control desert sand. As the young leader of the Mauhata tribe of Desert Warriors, he has been trained and educated to be the worthy successor to the great king. When the Trovatia tribe, their sworn brothers, were praying at the Shrine of Flow to awake the God Dragon, he led his warriors to defeat all demons approaching the oasis. Assisted by the God Dragon and Laudia, her priestess, he is fulfilling his role as a Desert Warrior defending his home. He hopes that his efforts make the late God King proud.

skill.name: Judgment of the Desert
skill.description: Deals 182140 P.DMG to enemies in a wide range, and per each enemies hit, reduces Cooldown by 1 sec. Deals 364309 P.DMG to enemies inflicted by [Mark of Desert] and removes 1 stack of [Mark of Desert]. Upon each Skill use, Crit DMG is increased by 5%. This effect can be stacked up to max 18 times and is irremovable.

skill.name: Blessing of the Sand Spirit
skill.description: Creates a shield around the ally with the lowest HP that absorbs 534273 DMG for 5 sec. Gains immunity to CC while the shield lasts. When the shield duration is over, 'Sand Storm' is activated and deals 261124 P.DMG to enemies in a wide range, inflicting 2 stacks of [Mark of Desert]. If the shield is dispelled or destroyed, 'Sand Storm' does not activate.

skill.name: Doom of the Desert
skill.description: Deals 123855 P.DMG to frontal enemies in a wide range and inflicts 1 stack of [Mark of Desert]. Then summons 'Pit of Sand' for 5 sec, dealing 41350 P.DMG every 0.5 sec, and decreasing their P.DEF by 30% for 10 sec. 'Pit of Sand' has a 25% chance of inflicting 1 stack of [Mark of Desert] and draws in all enemies in range to the center.

skill.name: Calling of the Guardian
skill.description: Each auto attack has a 15% chance of dealing 96597 P.DMG that ignores DEF to all enemies, inflicting 1 stack of [Mark of Desert]. [Mark of Desert] can be stacked up to max 10 times.

name: Shakmeh
description: The second prince of Ancient Sekireinel Kingdom who abandoned the desert and chose otherwordly darkness. He emerged as a threat to the world but was defeated by the new successor of the desert. However, he was born again with the fragment of darkness that remained from being the vessel of Tidhar. It is unclear whether he is fully Shakmeh himself or one of the Tidhar, the otherwordly Darkness, but his twisted obsession toward his brother, Cain, persists and serves as proof that he is, in fact, Shakmeh. Shakmeh's life until now was covered in dark emotions, but after being reborn, he wishes to move forward by obtaining a greater power of darkness to destroy Aegina Desert and surpass Cain. Though Shakmeh is aware better than anyone what the path he chose means, he has made up his mind not to hesitate or falter no matter what direction the results will lea him - for he has become the one who walks inside the darkness.

skill.name: Wind of Heart
skill.description: Attacks frontal enemies in a straight line, dealing a total of 282970 P.DMG over 5 times. Each hit recovers self's Mana by 100.

skill.name: Gate of Grudges
skill.description: Creates [Gate of Grudges] in frontal of self for 7 sec, dealing a total of 463092 P.DMG to enemies in range. Each hit inflicts a stack of [Grudge] that lasts for 15 sec on enemies. [Grudge] can be stacked up to max 5 times, and each stack reduces the target's Heal Rate by 4%. If the target is not a Hero, Heal Rate Reduction is increased by 2 times.

skill.name: Advent of Despair
skill.description: Dispels negative effects from self and consumes all [Dark Spirit] stacks to increase all allies' ATK by 10% + 0.5% per [Dark Spirit] stack for 15 sec, deal 201864 additional P.DMG to all enemies, inflict Stun for 3 sec, and increases P.DMG the targets take by 20% + 1% per [Dark Spirit] stack for 15 sec. DMG of this Skill increases by 10% per [Dark Spirit] stack. If the target is not a Hero, DMG Boost per stack increases by 2 times.

skill.name: Vessel of Dark Spirit
skill.description: Increases Max HP by 20%. Dealing DMG to an enemy with a Skill deals additional P.DMG equal to 1% of self's Max HP, heals HP of all allies equal to 0.1% of self's Max HP, increases their M.DEF by 707 for 15 sec, and stacks [Dark Spirit] that lasts for 30 sec upon self. [Dark Spirit] can be stacked up to max 30 times, and is irremovable. The M.DEF Boost effect can be stacked up to max 30 timws.
